 133 #if defined(__GNUC__) && !defined(__clang__) // we shouldn't need this for clang, but for gcc and tdm-gcc we probably do
 134 #if __GNUC__ > 4 || (__GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 6 ) // "GCC diagnostic ignored" is apparently not available at version 4.5.2

 139 static lg::log_domain log_scripting_lua("scripting/lua");
 140 #define LOG_LUA LOG_STREAM(info, log_scripting_lua)
 141 #define WRN_LUA LOG_STREAM(warn, log_scripting_lua)
 142 #define ERR_LUA LOG_STREAM(err, log_scripting_lua)

 144 std::vector<config> game_lua_kernel::preload_scripts;
 145 config game_lua_kernel::preload_config;
 146 
 147 // Template which allows to push member functions to the lua kernel base into lua as C functions, using a shim
 148 typedef int (game_lua_kernel::*member_callback)(lua_State *);
 149 
 150 template <member_callback method>
 151 int dispatch(lua_State *L) {
 152         return ((lua_kernel_base::get_lua_kernel<game_lua_kernel>(L)).*method)(L);
 153 }
 154 
 155 // Pass a const bool also...
 156 typedef int (game_lua_kernel::*member_callback2)(lua_State *, bool);
 157 
 158 template <member_callback2 method, bool b>
 159 int dispatch2(lua_State *L) {
 160         return ((lua_kernel_base::get_lua_kernel<game_lua_kernel>(L)).*method)(L, b);
 161 }
 162 
 163 struct map_locker
 164 {
 165         map_locker(game_lua_kernel* kernel) : kernel_(kernel)
 166         {
 167                 ++kernel_->map_locked_;
 168         }
 169         ~map_locker()
 170         {
 171                 --kernel_->map_locked_;
 172         }
 173         game_lua_kernel* kernel_;
 174 };

 176 
 177 void game_lua_kernel::extract_preload_scripts(config const &game_config)
 178 {
 179         game_lua_kernel::preload_scripts.clear();
 180         for (config const &cfg : game_config.child_range("lua")) {
 181                 game_lua_kernel::preload_scripts.push_back(cfg);
 182         }
 183         game_lua_kernel::preload_config = game_config.child("game_config");
 184 }
 185 
 186 void game_lua_kernel::log_error(char const * msg, char const * context)
 187 {
 188         lua_kernel_base::log_error(msg, context);
 189         lua_chat(context, msg);
 190 }
 191 
 192 void game_lua_kernel::lua_chat(const std::string& caption, const std::string& msg)
 193 {
 194         if (game_display_) {
 195                 game_display_->get_chat_manager().add_chat_message(time(nullptr), caption, 0, msg,
 196                         events::chat_handler::MESSAGE_PUBLIC, false);
 197         }
 198 }

 200 /**
 201  * Gets a vector of sides from side= attribute in a given config node.
 202  * Promotes consistent behavior.
 203  */
 204 std::vector<int> game_lua_kernel::get_sides_vector(const vconfig& cfg)
 205 {
 206         const config::attribute_value sides = cfg["side"];
 207         const vconfig &ssf = cfg.child("filter_side");
 208 
 209         if (!ssf.null()) {
 210                 if(!sides.empty()) { WRN_LUA << "ignoring duplicate side filter information (inline side=)" << std::endl; }
 211                 side_filter filter(ssf, &game_state_);
 212                 return filter.get_teams();
 213         }
 214 
 215         side_filter filter(sides.str(), &game_state_);
 216         return filter.get_teams();
 217 }

 221 static int special_locations_len(lua_State *L)
 222 {
 223         lua_pushnumber(L, lua_kernel_base::get_lua_kernel<game_lua_kernel>(L).map().special_locations().size());
 224         return 1;
 225 }
 226 
 227 static int special_locations_next(lua_State *L)
 228 {
 229         const t_translation::starting_positions::left_map& left = lua_kernel_base::get_lua_kernel<game_lua_kernel>(L).map().special_locations().left;
 230 
 231         t_translation::starting_positions::left_const_iterator it;
 232         if (lua_isnoneornil(L, 2)) {
 233                 it = left.begin();
 234         }
 235         else {
 236                 it = left.find(luaL_checkstring(L, 2));
 237                 if (it == left.end()) {
 238                         return 0;
 239                 }
 240                 ++it;
 241         }
 242         if (it == left.end()) {
 243                 return 0;
 244         }
 245         lua_pushstring(L, it->first.c_str());
 246         luaW_pushlocation(L, it->second);
 247         return 2;
 248 }
 249 
 250 static int special_locations_pairs(lua_State *L)
 251 {
 252         lua_pushcfunction(L, &special_locations_next);
 253         lua_pushvalue(L, -2);
 254         lua_pushnil(L);
 255         return 3;
 256 }
 257 
 258 static int special_locations_index(lua_State *L)
 259 {
 260         const t_translation::starting_positions::left_map& left = lua_kernel_base::get_lua_kernel<game_lua_kernel>(L).map().special_locations().left;
 261         auto it = left.find(luaL_checkstring(L, 2));
 262         if (it == left.end()) {
 263                 return 0;
 264         }
 265         else {
 266                 luaW_pushlocation(L, it->second);
 267                 return 1;
 268         }
 269 }
 270 
 271 static int special_locations_newindex(lua_State *L)
 272 {
 273         lua_pushstring(L, "special locations cannot be modified using wesnoth.special_locations");
 274         return lua_error(L);
 275 }
 276 
 277 static void push_locations_table(lua_State *L)
 278 {
 279         lua_newtable(L); // The functor table
 280         lua_newtable(L); // The functor metatable
 281         lua_pushstring(L, "__len");
 282         lua_pushcfunction(L, &special_locations_len);
 283         lua_rawset(L, -3);
 284         lua_pushstring(L, "__index");
 285         lua_pushcfunction(L, &special_locations_index);
 286         lua_rawset(L, -3);
 287         lua_pushstring(L, "__newindex");
 288         lua_pushcfunction(L, &special_locations_newindex);
 289         lua_rawset(L, -3);
 290         lua_pushstring(L, "__pairs");
 291         lua_pushcfunction(L, &special_locations_pairs);
 292         lua_rawset(L, -3);
 293         lua_setmetatable(L, -2); // Apply the metatable to the functor table
 294 }

 296 namespace {
 297         /**
 298          * Temporary entry to a queued_event stack
 299          */
 300         struct queued_event_context
 301         {
 302                 typedef game_events::queued_event qe;
 303                 std::stack<qe const *> & stack_;
 304 
 305                 queued_event_context(qe const *new_qe, std::stack<qe const*> & stack)
 306                         : stack_(stack)
 307                 {
 308                         stack_.push(new_qe);
 309                 }
 310 
 311                 ~queued_event_context()
 312                 {
 313                         stack_.pop();
 314                 }
 315         };
 316 }//unnamed namespace for queued_event_context

 318 /**
 319  * Gets currently viewing side.
 320  * - Ret 1: integer specifying the currently viewing side
 321  * - Ret 2: Bool whether the vision is not limited to that team, this can for example be true during replays.
 322  */
 323 static int intf_get_viewing_side(lua_State *L)
 324 {
 325         if(const display* disp = display::get_singleton()) {
 326                 lua_pushinteger(L, disp->viewing_side());
 327                 lua_pushboolean(L, disp->show_everything());
 328                 return 2;
 329         }
 330         else {
 331                 return 0;
 332         }
 333 }

 335 static const char animatorKey[] = "unit animator";
 336 
 337 static int impl_animator_collect(lua_State* L) {
 338         unit_animator& anim = *static_cast<unit_animator*>(luaL_checkudata(L, 1, animatorKey));
 339         anim.~unit_animator();
 340         return 0;
 341 }
 342 
 343 static int impl_add_animation(lua_State* L)
 344 {
 345         unit_animator& anim = *static_cast<unit_animator*>(luaL_checkudata(L, 1, animatorKey));
 346         unit& u = luaW_checkunit(L, 2);
 347         std::string which = luaL_checkstring(L, 3);
 348 
 349         using hit_type = unit_animation::hit_type;
 350         std::string hits_str = luaL_checkstring(L, 4);
 351         hit_type hits = hit_type::string_to_enum(hits_str, hit_type::INVALID);
 352 
 353         map_location dest;
 354         int v1 = 0, v2 = 0;
 355         bool bars = false;
 356         t_string text;
 357         color_t color{255, 255, 255};
 358         const_attack_ptr primary, secondary;
 359 
 360         if(lua_istable(L, 5)) {
 361                 lua_getfield(L, 5, "target");
 362                 if(luaW_tolocation(L, -1, dest)) {
 363                         if(dest == u.get_location()) {
 364                                 return luaL_argerror(L, 5, "target location must be different from animated unit's location");
 365                         } else if(!tiles_adjacent(dest, u.get_location())) {
 366                                 return luaL_argerror(L, 5, "target location must be adjacent to the animated unit");
 367                         }
 368                 } else {
 369                         // luaW_tolocation may set the location to (0,0) if it fails
 370                         dest = map_location();
 371                         if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, -1)) {
 372                                 return luaW_type_error(L, 5, "target", "location table");
 373                         }
 374                 }
 375                 lua_pop(L, 1);
 376 
 377                 lua_getfield(L, 5, "value");
 378                 if(lua_isnumber(L, -1)) {
 379                         v1 = lua_tonumber(L, -1);
 380                 } else if(lua_istable(L, -1)) {
 381                         lua_rawgeti(L, -1, 1);
 382                         v1 = lua_tonumber(L, -1);
 383                         lua_pop(L, 1);
 384                         lua_rawgeti(L, -1, 2);
 385                         v2 = lua_tonumber(L, -1);
 386                         lua_pop(L, 1);
 387                 } else if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, -1)) {
 388                         return luaW_type_error(L, 5, "value", "number or array of two numbers");
 389                 }
 390                 lua_pop(L, 1);
 391 
 392                 lua_getfield(L, 5, "with_bars");
 393                 if(lua_isboolean(L, -1)) {
 394                         bars = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
 395                 } else if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, -1)) {
 396                         return luaW_type_error(L, 5, "with_bars", lua_typename(L, LUA_TBOOLEAN));
 397                 }
 398                 lua_pop(L, 1);
 399 
 400                 lua_getfield(L, 5, "text");
 401                 if(lua_isstring(L, -1)) {
 402                         text = lua_tostring(L, -1);
 403                 } else if(luaW_totstring(L, -1, text)) {
 404                         // Do nothing; luaW_totstring already assigned the value
 405                 } else if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, -1)) {
 406                         return luaW_type_error(L, 5, "text", lua_typename(L, LUA_TSTRING));
 407                 }
 408                 lua_pop(L, 1);
 409 
 410                 lua_getfield(L, 5, "color");
 411                 if(lua_istable(L, -1) && lua_rawlen(L, -1) == 3) {
 412                         int idx = lua_absindex(L, -1);
 413                         lua_rawgeti(L, idx, 1); // red @ -3
 414                         lua_rawgeti(L, idx, 2); // green @ -2
 415                         lua_rawgeti(L, idx, 3); // blue @ -1
 416                         color = color_t(lua_tonumber(L, -3), lua_tonumber(L, -2), lua_tonumber(L, -1));
 417                         lua_pop(L, 3);
 418                 } else if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, -1)) {
 419                         return luaW_type_error(L, 5, "color", "array of three numbers");
 420                 }
 421                 lua_pop(L, 1);
 422 
 423                 lua_getfield(L, 5, "primary");
 424                 primary = luaW_toweapon(L, -1);
 425                 if(!primary && !lua_isnoneornil(L, -1)) {
 426                         return luaW_type_error(L, 5, "primary", "weapon");
 427                 }
 428                 lua_pop(L, 1);
 429 
 430                 lua_getfield(L, 5, "secondary");
 431                 secondary = luaW_toweapon(L, -1);
 432                 if(!secondary && !lua_isnoneornil(L, -1)) {
 433                         return luaW_type_error(L, 5, "secondary", "weapon");
 434                 }
 435                 lua_pop(L, 1);
 436         } else if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, 5)) {
 437                 return luaW_type_error(L, 5, "table of options");
 438         }
 439 
 440         anim.add_animation(&u, which, u.get_location(), dest, v1, bars, text, color, hits, primary, secondary, v2);
 441         return 0;
 442 }
 443 
 444 static int impl_run_animation(lua_State* L)
 445 {
 446         unit_animator& anim = *static_cast<unit_animator*>(luaL_checkudata(L, 1, animatorKey));
 447         anim.start_animations();
 448         anim.wait_for_end();
 449         anim.set_all_standing();
 450         return 0;
 451 }
 452 
 453 static int impl_clear_animation(lua_State* L)
 454 {
 455         unit_animator& anim = *static_cast<unit_animator*>(luaL_checkudata(L, 1, animatorKey));
 456         anim.clear();
 457         return 0;
 458 }
 459 
 460 static int impl_animator_get(lua_State* L)
 461 {
 462         const char* m = lua_tostring(L, 2);
 463         return luaW_getmetafield(L, 1, m);
 464 }
 465 
 466 static int intf_create_animator(lua_State* L)
 467 {
 468         new(L) unit_animator;
 469         if(luaL_newmetatable(L, animatorKey)) {
 470                 luaL_Reg metafuncs[] {
 471                         {"__gc", impl_animator_collect},
 472                         {"__index", impl_animator_get},
 473                         {"add", impl_add_animation},
 474                         {"run", impl_run_animation},
 475                         {"clear", impl_clear_animation},
 476                         {nullptr, nullptr},
 477                 };
 478                 luaL_setfuncs(L, metafuncs, 0);
 479                 lua_pushstring(L, "__metatable");
 480                 lua_setfield(L, -2, animatorKey);
 481         }
 482         lua_setmetatable(L, -2);
 483         return 1;
 484 }

 486 int game_lua_kernel::intf_gamestate_inspector(lua_State *L)
 487 {
 488         if (game_display_) {
 489                 return lua_gui2::show_gamestate_inspector(game_display_->video(), luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1), gamedata(), game_state_);
 490         }
 491         return 0;
 492 }

 494 /**
 495  * Gets the unit at the given location or with the given id.
 496  * - Arg 1: location
 497  * OR
 498  * - Arg 1: string ID
 499  * - Ret 1: full userdata with __index pointing to impl_unit_get and
 500  *          __newindex pointing to impl_unit_set.
 501  */
 502 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_unit(lua_State *L)
 503 {
 504         map_location loc;
 505         if(lua_isstring(L, 1) && !lua_isnumber(L, 1)) {
 506                 std::string id = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
 507                 for(const unit& u : units()) {
 508                         if(u.id() == id) {
 509                                 luaW_pushunit(L, u.underlying_id());
 510                                 return 1;
 511                         }
 512                 }
 513                 return 0;
 514         }
 515         if(!luaW_tolocation(L, 1, loc)) {
 516                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "expected string or location");
 517         }
 518         unit_map::const_iterator ui = units().find(loc);
 519 
 520         if (!ui.valid()) return 0;
 521 
 522         luaW_pushunit(L, ui->underlying_id());
 523         return 1;
 524 }
 525 
 526 /**
 527  * Gets the unit displayed in the sidebar.
 528  * - Ret 1: full userdata with __index pointing to impl_unit_get and
 529  *          __newindex pointing to impl_unit_set.
 530  */
 531 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_displayed_unit(lua_State *L)
 532 {
 533         if (!game_display_) {
 534                 return 0;
 535         }
 536 
 537         unit_map::const_iterator ui = board().find_visible_unit(
 538                 game_display_->displayed_unit_hex(),
 539                 teams()[game_display_->viewing_team()],
 540                 game_display_->show_everything());
 541         if (!ui.valid()) return 0;
 542 
 543         luaW_pushunit(L, ui->underlying_id());
 544         return 1;
 545 }

 547 /**
 548  * Gets all the units matching a given filter.
 549  * - Arg 1: optional table containing a filter
 550  * - Arg 2: optional location (to find all units that would match on that location)
 551                   OR unit (to find all units that would match adjacent to that unit)
 552  * - Ret 1: table containing full userdata with __index pointing to
 553  *          impl_unit_get and __newindex pointing to impl_unit_set.
 554  */
 555 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_units(lua_State *L)
 556 {
 557         vconfig filter = luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1, true);
 558 
 559         // note that if filter is null, this yields a null filter matching everything (and doing no work)
 560         filter_context & fc = game_state_;
 561         unit_filter filt(filter, &fc);
 562         std::vector<const unit*> units;
 563 
 564         if(unit* u_adj = luaW_tounit(L, 2)) {
 565                 if(!u_adj) {
 566                         return luaL_argerror(L, 2, "unit not found");
 567                 }
 568                 units = filt.all_matches_with_unit(*u_adj);
 569         } else if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, 2)) {
 570                 map_location loc;
 571                 luaW_tolocation(L, 2, loc);
 572                 if(!loc.valid()) {
 573                         return luaL_argerror(L, 2, "invalid location");
 574                 }
 575                 units = filt.all_matches_at(loc);
 576         } else {
 577                 units = filt.all_matches_on_map();
 578         }
 579 
 580         // Go through all the units while keeping the following stack:
 581         // 1: return table, 2: userdata
 582         lua_settop(L, 0);
 583         lua_newtable(L);
 584         int i = 1;
 585 
 586         for (const unit * ui : units) {
 587                 luaW_pushunit(L, ui->underlying_id());
 588                 lua_rawseti(L, 1, i);
 589                 ++i;
 590         }
 591         return 1;
 592 }
 593 
 594 /**
 595  * Matches a unit against the given filter.
 596  * - Arg 1: full userdata.
 597  * - Arg 2: table containing a filter
 598  * - Arg 3: optional location OR optional "adjacent" unit
 599  * - Ret 1: boolean.
 600  */
 601 int game_lua_kernel::intf_match_unit(lua_State *L)
 602 {
 603         lua_unit& u = *luaW_checkunit_ref(L, 1);
 604 
 605         vconfig filter = luaW_checkvconfig(L, 2, true);
 606 
 607         if (filter.null()) {
 608                 lua_pushboolean(L, true);
 609                 return 1;
 610         }
 611 
 612         filter_context & fc = game_state_;
 613 
 614         if(unit* u_adj = luaW_tounit(L, 3)) {
 615                 if(int side = u.on_recall_list()) {
 616                         WRN_LUA << "wesnoth.match_unit called with a secondary unit (3rd argument), ";
 617                         WRN_LUA << "but unit to match was on recall list. ";
 618                         WRN_LUA << "Thus the 3rd argument is ignored.\n";
 619                         team &t = board().get_team(side);
 620                         scoped_recall_unit auto_store("this_unit", t.save_id(), t.recall_list().find_index(u->id()));
 621                         lua_pushboolean(L, unit_filter(filter, &fc).matches(*u, map_location()));
 622                         return 1;
 623                 }
 624                 if (!u_adj) {
 625                         return luaL_argerror(L, 3, "unit not found");
 626                 }
 627                 lua_pushboolean(L, unit_filter(filter, &fc).matches(*u, *u_adj));
 628         } else if(int side = u.on_recall_list()) {
 629                 map_location loc;
 630                 luaW_tolocation(L, 3, loc); // If argument 3 isn't a location, loc is unchanged
 631                 team &t = board().get_team(side);
 632                 scoped_recall_unit auto_store("this_unit", t.save_id(), t.recall_list().find_index(u->id()));
 633                 lua_pushboolean(L, unit_filter(filter, &fc).matches(*u, loc));
 634                 return 1;
 635         } else {
 636                 map_location loc = u->get_location();
 637                 luaW_tolocation(L, 3, loc); // If argument 3 isn't a location, loc is unchanged
 638                 lua_pushboolean(L, unit_filter(filter, &fc).matches(*u, loc));
 639         }
 640         return 1;
 641 }
 642 
 643 /**
 644  * Gets the numeric ids of all the units matching a given filter on the recall lists.
 645  * - Arg 1: optional table containing a filter
 646  * - Ret 1: table containing full userdata with __index pointing to
 647  *          impl_unit_get and __newindex pointing to impl_unit_set.
 648  */
 649 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_recall_units(lua_State *L)
 650 {
 651         vconfig filter = luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1, true);
 652 
 653         // Go through all the units while keeping the following stack:
 654         // 1: return table, 2: userdata
 655         lua_settop(L, 0);
 656         lua_newtable(L);
 657         int i = 1, s = 1;
 658         filter_context & fc = game_state_;
 659         const unit_filter ufilt(filter, &fc);
 660         for (team &t : teams())
 661         {
 662                 for (unit_ptr & u : t.recall_list())
 663                 {
 664                         if (!filter.null()) {
 665                                 scoped_recall_unit auto_store("this_unit",
 666                                         t.save_id(), t.recall_list().find_index(u->id()));
 667                                 if (!ufilt( *u, map_location() ))
 668                                         continue;
 669                         }
 670                         luaW_pushunit(L, s, u->underlying_id());
 671                         lua_rawseti(L, 1, i);
 672                         ++i;
 673                 }
 674                 ++s;
 675         }
 676         return 1;
 677 }
 678 
 679 /**
 680  * Fires an event.
 681  * - Arg 1: string containing the event name or id.
 682  * - Arg 2: optional first location.
 683  * - Arg 3: optional second location.
 684  * - Arg 4: optional WML table used as the [weapon] tag.
 685  * - Arg 5: optional WML table used as the [second_weapon] tag.
 686  * - Ret 1: boolean indicating whether the event was processed or not.
 687  */
 688 int game_lua_kernel::intf_fire_event(lua_State *L, const bool by_id)
 689 {
 690         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
 691 
 692         int pos = 2;
 693         map_location l1, l2;
 694         config data;
 695 
 696         if (luaW_tolocation(L, 2, l1)) {
 697                 if (luaW_tolocation(L, 3, l2)) {
 698                         pos = 4;
 699                 } else {
 700                         pos = 3;
 701                 }
 702         }
 703 
 704         if (!lua_isnoneornil(L, pos)) {
 705                 data.add_child("first", luaW_checkconfig(L, pos));
 706         }
 707         ++pos;
 708         if (!lua_isnoneornil(L, pos)) {
 709                 data.add_child("second", luaW_checkconfig(L, pos));
 710         }
 711 
 712         bool b = false;
 713 
 714         if (by_id) {
 715           b = play_controller_.pump().fire("", m, l1, l2, data);
 716         }
 717         else {
 718           b = play_controller_.pump().fire(m, l1, l2, data);
 719         }
 720         lua_pushboolean(L, b);
 721         return 1;
 722 }

 725 /**
 726  * Fires a wml menu item.
 727  * - Arg 1: id of the item. it is not possible to fire items that don't have ids with this function.
 728  * - Arg 2: optional first location.
 729  * - Ret 1: boolean, true indicating that the event was fired successfully
 730  *
 731  * NOTE: This is not an "official" feature, it may currently cause assertion failures if used with
 732  * menu items which have "needs_select". It is not supported right now to use it this way.
 733  * The purpose of this function right now is to make it possible to have automated sanity tests for
 734  * the wml menu items system.
 735  */
 736 int game_lua_kernel::intf_fire_wml_menu_item(lua_State *L)
 737 {
 738         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
 739 
 740         map_location l1 = luaW_checklocation(L, 2);
 741 
 742         bool b = game_state_.get_wml_menu_items().fire_item(m, l1, gamedata(), game_state_, units());
 743         lua_pushboolean(L, b);
 744         return 1;
 745 }

 747 /**
 748  * Gets a WML variable.
 749  * - Arg 1: string containing the variable name.
 750  * - Arg 2: optional bool indicating if tables for containers should be left empty.
 751  * - Ret 1: value of the variable, if any.
 752  */
 753 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_variable(lua_State *L)
 754 {
 755         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
 756         variable_access_const v = gamedata().get_variable_access_read(m);
 757         return luaW_pushvariable(L, v) ? 1 : 0;
 758 }
 759 
 760 /**
 761  * Gets a side specific WML variable.
 762  * - Arg 1: integer side number.
 763  * - Arg 2: string containing the variable name.
 764  * - Ret 1: value of the variable, if any.
 765  */
 766 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_side_variable(lua_State *L)
 767 {
 768 
 769         unsigned side_index = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1) - 1;
 770         if(side_index >= teams().size()) {
 771                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid side number");
 772         }
 773         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
 774         variable_access_const v(m, teams()[side_index].variables());
 775         return luaW_pushvariable(L, v) ? 1 : 0;
 776 }
 777 
 778 /**
 779  * Gets a side specific WML variable.
 780  * - Arg 1: integer side number.
 781  * - Arg 2: string containing the variable name.
 782  * - Arg 3: boolean/integer/string/table containing the value.
 783  */
 784 int game_lua_kernel::intf_set_side_variable(lua_State *L)
 785 {
 786         unsigned side = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1);
 787         if(side > teams().size() || side == 0) {
 788                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid side number");
 789         }
 790         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
 791         config& vars = game_state_.board_.get_team(side).variables();
 792         if(lua_isnoneornil(L, 3)) {
 793                 try {
 794                         variable_access_throw(m, vars).clear(false);
 795                 } catch(const invalid_variablename_exception&) {
 796                 }
 797                 return 0;
 798         }
 799         variable_access_create v(m, vars);
 800         luaW_checkvariable(L, v, 3);
 801         return 0;
 802 }
 803 
 804 /**
 805  * Sets a WML variable.
 806  * - Arg 1: string containing the variable name.
 807  * - Arg 2: boolean/integer/string/table containing the value.
 808  */
 809 int game_lua_kernel::intf_set_variable(lua_State *L)
 810 {
 811         const std::string m = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
 812         if(m.empty()) return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "empty variable name");
 813         if (lua_isnoneornil(L, 2)) {
 814                 gamedata().clear_variable(m);
 815                 return 0;
 816         }
 817         variable_access_create v = gamedata().get_variable_access_write(m);
 818         luaW_checkvariable(L, v, 2);
 819         return 0;
 820 }

 822 int game_lua_kernel::intf_set_menu_item(lua_State *L)
 823 {
 824         game_state_.get_wml_menu_items().set_item(luaL_checkstring(L, 1), luaW_checkvconfig(L,2));
 825         return 0;
 826 }
 827 
 828 int game_lua_kernel::intf_clear_menu_item(lua_State *L)
 829 {
 830         std::string ids(luaL_checkstring(L, 1));
 831         for(const std::string& id : utils::split(ids, ',', utils::STRIP_SPACES)) {
 832                 if(id.empty()) {
 833                         WRN_LUA << "[clear_menu_item] has been given an empty id=, ignoring" << std::endl;
 834                         continue;
 835                 }
 836                 game_state_.get_wml_menu_items().erase(id);
 837         }
 838         return 0;
 839 }

 865 
 866 int game_lua_kernel::intf_shroud_op(lua_State *L, bool place_shroud)
 867 {
 868 
 869         int side_num = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1);
 870 
 871         if(lua_isstring(L, 2)) {
 872                 std::string data = lua_tostring(L, 2);
 873                 // Special case - using a shroud_data string, or "all"
 874                 team& side = board().get_team(side_num);
 875                 if(place_shroud) {
 876                         side.reshroud();
 877                 }
 878                 if(data != "all") {
 879                         side.merge_shroud_map_data(data);
 880                 } else if(!place_shroud) {
 881                         bool was_shrouded = side.uses_shroud();
 882                         side.set_shroud(false);
 883                         actions::clear_shroud(side.side());
 884                         side.set_shroud(was_shrouded);
 885                 }
 886                 return 0;
 887         } else if(lua_istable(L, 2)) {
 888                 std::vector<map_location> locs_v = lua_check<std::vector<map_location>>(L, 2);
 889                 std::set<map_location> locs(locs_v.begin(), locs_v.end());
 890                 team &t = board().get_team(side_num);
 891 
 892                 for (map_location const &loc : locs)
 893                 {
 894                         if (place_shroud) {
 895                                 t.place_shroud(loc);
 896                         } else {
 897                                 t.clear_shroud(loc);
 898                         }
 899                 }
 900         } else {
 901                 return luaL_argerror(L, 2, "expected list of locations or shroud data string");
 902         }
 903 
 904         game_display_->labels().recalculate_shroud();
 905         game_display_->recalculate_minimap();
 906         game_display_->invalidate_all();
 907 
 908         return 0;
 909 }

 916 int game_lua_kernel::intf_highlight_hex(lua_State *L)
 917 {
 918         if (!game_display_) {
 919                 return 0;

 922         const map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 1);
 923         if(!map().on_board(loc)) return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "not on board");
 924         game_display_->highlight_hex(loc);
 925         game_display_->display_unit_hex(loc);
 926 
 927         return 0;
 928 }

 930 /**
 931  * Returns whether the first side is an enemy of the second one.
 932  * - Args 1,2: side numbers.
 933  * - Ret 1: boolean.
 934  */
 935 int game_lua_kernel::intf_is_enemy(lua_State *L)
 936 {
 937         unsigned side_1 = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1) - 1;
 938         unsigned side_2 = luaL_checkinteger(L, 2) - 1;
 939         if (side_1 >= teams().size() || side_2 >= teams().size()) return 0;
 940         lua_pushboolean(L, teams()[side_1].is_enemy(side_2 + 1));
 941         return 1;
 942 }

 971 /**
 972  * Gets a terrain code.
 973  * - Arg 1: map location.
 974  * - Ret 1: string.
 975  */
 976 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_terrain(lua_State *L)
 977 {
 978         map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 1);
 979 
 980         t_translation::terrain_code const &t = board().map().
 981                 get_terrain(loc);
 982         lua_pushstring(L, t_translation::write_terrain_code(t).c_str());
 983         return 1;
 984 }

 986 /**
 987  * Sets a terrain code.
 988  * - Arg 1: map location.
 989  * - Arg 2: terrain code string.
 990  * - Arg 3: layer: (overlay|base|both, default=both)
 991  * - Arg 4: replace_if_failed, default = no
 992  */
 993 int game_lua_kernel::intf_set_terrain(lua_State *L)
 994 {
 995         map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 1);
 996         std::string t_str(luaL_checkstring(L, 2));
 997 
 998         std::string mode_str = "both";
 999         bool replace_if_failed = false;
1000         if (!lua_isnone(L, 3)) {
1001                 if (!lua_isnil(L, 3)) {
1002                         mode_str = luaL_checkstring(L, 3);
1003                 }
1004 
1005                 if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, 4)) {
1006                         replace_if_failed = luaW_toboolean(L, 4);
1007                 }
1008         }
1009 
1010         bool result = board().change_terrain(loc, t_str, mode_str, replace_if_failed);
1011 
1012         if (game_display_) {
1013                 game_display_->needs_rebuild(result);
1014         }
1015 
1016         return 0;
1017 }

1019 /**
1020  * Gets details about a terrain.
1021  * - Arg 1: terrain code string.
1022  * - Ret 1: table.
1023  */
1024 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_terrain_info(lua_State *L)
1025 {
1026         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
1027         t_translation::terrain_code t = t_translation::read_terrain_code(m);
1028         if (t == t_translation::NONE_TERRAIN) return 0;
1029         terrain_type const &info = board().map().tdata()->get_terrain_info(t);
1030 
1031         lua_newtable(L);
1032         lua_pushstring(L, info.id().c_str());
1033         lua_setfield(L, -2, "id");
1034         luaW_pushtstring(L, info.name());
1035         lua_setfield(L, -2, "name");
1036         luaW_pushtstring(L, info.editor_name());
1037         lua_setfield(L, -2, "editor_name");
1038         luaW_pushtstring(L, info.description());
1039         lua_setfield(L, -2, "description");
1040         lua_push(L, info.icon_image());
1041         lua_setfield(L, -2, "icon");
1042         lua_push(L, info.editor_image());
1043         lua_setfield(L, -2, "editor_image");
1044         lua_pushinteger(L, info.light_bonus(0));
1045         lua_setfield(L, -2, "light");
1046         lua_pushboolean(L, info.is_village());
1047         lua_setfield(L, -2, "village");
1048         lua_pushboolean(L, info.is_castle());
1049         lua_setfield(L, -2, "castle");
1050         lua_pushboolean(L, info.is_keep());
1051         lua_setfield(L, -2, "keep");
1052         lua_pushinteger(L, info.gives_healing());
1053         lua_setfield(L, -2, "healing");
1054 
1055         return 1;
1056 }
1057 
1058 /**
1059  * Gets time of day information.
1060  * - Arg 1: optional turn number
1061  * - Arg 2: optional location
1062  * - Arg 3: optional boolean (consider_illuminates)
1063  * - Ret 1: table.
1064  */
1065 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_time_of_day(lua_State *L)
1066 {
1067         unsigned arg = 1;
1068 
1069         int for_turn = tod_man().turn();
1070         map_location loc = map_location();
1071         bool consider_illuminates = false;
1072 
1073         if(lua_isnumber(L, arg)) {
1074                 ++arg;
1075                 for_turn = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1);
1076                 int number_of_turns = tod_man().number_of_turns();
1077                 if(for_turn < 1 || (number_of_turns != -1 && for_turn > number_of_turns)) {
1078                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "turn number out of range");
1079                 }
1080         }
1081         else if(lua_isnil(L, arg)) ++arg;
1082 
1083         if(luaW_tolocation(L, arg, loc)) {
1084                 if(!board().map().on_board(loc)) return luaL_argerror(L, arg, "coordinates are not on board");
1085 
1086                 if(lua_istable(L, arg)) {
1087                         lua_rawgeti(L, arg, 3);
1088                         consider_illuminates = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
1089                         lua_pop(L, 1);
1090                 } else if(lua_isboolean(L, arg + 1)) {
1091                         consider_illuminates = luaW_toboolean(L, arg + 1);
1092                 }
1093         }
1094 
1095         const time_of_day& tod = consider_illuminates ?
1096                 tod_man().get_illuminated_time_of_day(board().units(), board().map(), loc, for_turn) :
1097                 tod_man().get_time_of_day(loc, for_turn);
1098 
1099         lua_newtable(L);
1100         lua_pushstring(L, tod.id.c_str());
1101         lua_setfield(L, -2, "id");
1102         lua_pushinteger(L, tod.lawful_bonus);
1103         lua_setfield(L, -2, "lawful_bonus");
1104         lua_pushinteger(L, tod.bonus_modified);
1105         lua_setfield(L, -2, "bonus_modified");
1106         lua_pushstring(L, tod.image.c_str());
1107         lua_setfield(L, -2, "image");
1108         luaW_pushtstring(L, tod.name);
1109         lua_setfield(L, -2, "name");
1110 
1111         lua_pushinteger(L, tod.color.r);
1112         lua_setfield(L, -2, "red");
1113         lua_pushinteger(L, tod.color.g);
1114         lua_setfield(L, -2, "green");
1115         lua_pushinteger(L, tod.color.b);
1116         lua_setfield(L, -2, "blue");
1117 
1118         return 1;
1119 }

1121 /**
1122  * Gets the side of a village owner.
1123  * - Arg 1: map location.
1124  * - Ret 1: integer.
1125  */
1126 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_village_owner(lua_State *L)
1127 {
1128         map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 1);
1129         if (!board().map().is_village(loc))
1130                 return 0;
1131 
1132         int side = board().village_owner(loc) + 1;
1133         if (!side) return 0;
1134         lua_pushinteger(L, side);
1135         return 1;
1136 }
1137 
1138 /**
1139  * Sets the owner of a village.
1140  * - Arg 1: map location.
1141  * - Arg 2: integer for the side or empty to remove ownership.
1142  */
1143 int game_lua_kernel::intf_set_village_owner(lua_State *L)
1144 {
1145         map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 1);
1146         int new_side = lua_isnoneornil(L, 2) ? 0 : luaL_checkinteger(L, 2);
1147 
1148         if (!board().map().is_village(loc))
1149                 return 0;
1150 
1151         int old_side = board().village_owner(loc) + 1;
1152 
1153         if (new_side == old_side || new_side < 0 || new_side > static_cast<int>(teams().size()) || board().team_is_defeated(board().get_team(new_side))) {
1154                 return 0;
1155         }
1156 
1157         if (old_side) {
1158                 board().get_team(old_side).lose_village(loc);
1159         }
1160         if (new_side) {
1161                 board().get_team(new_side).get_village(loc, old_side, (luaW_toboolean(L, 4) ? &gamedata() : nullptr) );
1162         }
1163         return 0;
1164 }

1248 /**
1249  * Gets some game_config data (__index metamethod).
1250  * - Arg 1: userdata (ignored).
1251  * - Arg 2: string containing the name of the property.
1252  * - Ret 1: something containing the attribute.
1253  */
1254 int game_lua_kernel::impl_game_config_get(lua_State *L)
1255 {
1256         LOG_LUA << "impl_game_config_get\n";
1257         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
1258 
1259         // Find the corresponding attribute.
1260         return_int_attrib("last_turn", tod_man().number_of_turns());
1261         return_string_attrib("next_scenario", gamedata().next_scenario());
1262         return_string_attrib("theme", gamedata().get_theme());
1263         return_string_attrib("scenario_id", gamedata().get_id());
1264         return_vector_string_attrib("defeat_music", gamedata().get_defeat_music());
1265         return_vector_string_attrib("victory_music", gamedata().get_victory_music());
1266 
1267         const mp_game_settings& mp_settings = play_controller_.get_mp_settings();
1268         const game_classification & classification = play_controller_.get_classification();
1269 
1270         return_string_attrib("campaign_type", classification.campaign_type.to_string());
1271         if(classification.campaign_type==game_classification::CAMPAIGN_TYPE::MULTIPLAYER) {
1272                 return_cfgref_attrib("mp_settings", mp_settings.to_config());
1273                 return_cfgref_attrib("era", game_config_manager::get()->game_config().find_child("era","id",mp_settings.mp_era));
1274                 //^ finds the era with name matching mp_era, and creates a lua reference from the config of that era.
1275 
1276                 //This code for SigurdFD, not the cleanest implementation but seems to work just fine.
1277                 config::const_child_itors its = game_config_manager::get()->game_config().child_range("era");
1278                 std::string eras_list(its.front()["id"]);
1279                 its.pop_front();
1280                 for(const auto& cfg : its) {
1281                         eras_list = eras_list + "," + cfg["id"];
1282                 }
1283                 return_string_attrib("eras", eras_list);
1284         }
1285         return lua_kernel_base::impl_game_config_get(L);
1286 }

1289  * Sets some game_config data (__newindex metamethod).
1290  * - Arg 1: userdata (ignored).

1292  * - Arg 3: something containing the attribute.
1293  */
1294 int game_lua_kernel::impl_game_config_set(lua_State *L)

1298 
1299         // Find the corresponding attribute.
1300         modify_int_attrib("base_income", game_config::base_income = value);
1301         modify_int_attrib("village_income", game_config::village_income = value);

1313         );

1315         modify_vector_string_attrib("victory_music", gamedata().set_victory_music(std::move(value)));

1318 
1319 /**
1320         converts synced_context::get_synced_state() to a string.
1321 */
1322 std::string game_lua_kernel::synced_state()
1323 {
1324         //maybe return "initial" for game_data::INITIAL?
1325         if(gamedata().phase() == game_data::PRELOAD || gamedata().phase() == game_data::INITIAL)
1326         {
1327                 return "preload";
1328         }
1329         switch(synced_context::get_synced_state())
1330         {
1331         case synced_context::LOCAL_CHOICE:
1332                 return "local_choice";
1333         case synced_context::SYNCED:
1334                 return "synced";
1335         case synced_context::UNSYNCED:
1336                 return "unsynced";
1337         default:
1338                 throw game::game_error("Found corrupt synced_context::synced_state");
1339         }
1340 }

1343 /**
1344  * Gets some data about current point of game (__index metamethod).
1345  * - Arg 1: userdata (ignored).
1346  * - Arg 2: string containing the name of the property.
1347  * - Ret 1: something containing the attribute.
1348  */
1349 int game_lua_kernel::impl_current_get(lua_State *L)
1350 {
1351         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
1352 
1353         // Find the corresponding attribute.
1354         return_int_attrib("side", play_controller_.current_side());
1355         return_int_attrib("turn", play_controller_.turn());
1356         return_string_attrib("synced_state", synced_state());
1357 
1358         if (strcmp(m, "event_context") == 0)
1359         {
1360                 const game_events::queued_event &ev = get_event_info();
1361                 config cfg;
1362                 cfg["name"] = ev.name;
1363                 cfg["id"]   = ev.id;
1364                 if (const config &weapon = ev.data.child("first")) {
1365                         cfg.add_child("weapon", weapon);
1366                 }
1367                 if (const config &weapon = ev.data.child("second")) {
1368                         cfg.add_child("second_weapon", weapon);
1369                 }
1370                 if (ev.loc1.valid()) {
1371                         cfg["x1"] = ev.loc1.filter_loc().wml_x();
1372                         cfg["y1"] = ev.loc1.filter_loc().wml_y();
1373                         // The position of the unit involved in this event, currently the only case where this is different from x1/y1 are enter/exit_hex events
1374                         cfg["unit_x"] = ev.loc1.wml_x();
1375                         cfg["unit_y"] = ev.loc1.wml_y();
1376                 }
1377                 if (ev.loc2.valid()) {
1378                         cfg["x2"] = ev.loc2.filter_loc().wml_x();
1379                         cfg["y2"] = ev.loc2.filter_loc().wml_y();
1380                 }
1381                 luaW_pushconfig(L, cfg);
1382                 return 1;
1383         }
1384 
1385         return 0;
1386 }

1388 /**
1389  * Displays a message in the chat window and in the logs.
1390  * - Arg 1: optional message header.
1391  * - Arg 2 (or 1): message.
1392  */
1393 int game_lua_kernel::intf_message(lua_State *L)
1394 {

1396         t_string h = m;
1397         if (lua_isnone(L, 2)) {
1398                 h = "Lua";
1399         } else {
1400                 m = luaW_checktstring(L, 2);
1401         }
1402         lua_chat(h, m);
1403         LOG_LUA << "Script says: \"" << m << "\"\n";
1404         return 0;
1405 }

1415 int game_lua_kernel::intf_zoom(lua_State* L)
1416 {
1417         if(!game_display_) {
1418                 return 0;
1419         }
1420         double factor = luaL_checknumber(L, 1);
1421         bool relative = luaW_toboolean(L, 2);
1422         if(relative) {
1423                 factor *= game_display_->get_zoom_factor();
1424         }
1425         // Passing true explicitly to avoid casting to int.
1426         // Without doing one of the two, the call is ambiguous.
1427         game_display_->set_zoom(factor * game_config::tile_size, true);
1428         lua_pushnumber(L, game_display_->get_zoom_factor());
1429         return 1;
1430 }

1494         modify_bool_attrib("reveal_map", data.transient.reveal_map = value);

1496         modify_bool_attrib("prescenario_save", data.prescenario_save = value);

1502 static int impl_end_level_data_collect(lua_State* L)
1503 {
1504         end_level_data* data = static_cast<end_level_data*>(lua_touserdata(L, 1));
1505         (void)data; // Suppress an erroneous MSVC warning (a destructor call doesn't count as a reference)
1506         data->~end_level_data();
1507         return 0;
1508 }
1509 
1510 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_end_level_data(lua_State* L)
1511 {
1512         if (!play_controller_.is_regular_game_end()) {
1513                 return 0;
1514         }
1515         auto data = play_controller_.get_end_level_data_const();
1516         new(L) end_level_data(data);
1517         if(luaL_newmetatable(L, "end level data")) {
1518                 static luaL_Reg const callbacks[] {
1519                         { "__index",        &impl_end_level_data_get},
1520                         { "__newindex",     &dispatch<&game_lua_kernel::impl_end_level_data_set>},
1521                         { "__gc",           &impl_end_level_data_collect},
1522                         { nullptr, nullptr }
1523                 };
1524                 luaL_setfuncs(L, callbacks, 0);
1525         }
1526         lua_setmetatable(L, -2);
1527         return 1;
1528 }
1529 
1530 int game_lua_kernel::intf_end_level(lua_State *L)
1531 {
1532         vconfig cfg(luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1));
1533         end_level_data data;
1534 
1535         data.proceed_to_next_level = cfg["proceed_to_next_level"].to_bool(true);
1536         data.transient.carryover_report = cfg["carryover_report"].to_bool(true);
1537         data.prescenario_save = cfg["save"].to_bool(true);
1538         data.replay_save = cfg["replay_save"].to_bool(true);
1539         data.transient.linger_mode = cfg["linger_mode"].to_bool(true) && !teams().empty();
1540         data.transient.reveal_map = cfg["reveal_map"].to_bool(true);
1541         data.is_victory = cfg["result"] == "victory";
1542         play_controller_.set_end_level_data(data);
1543         return 0;
1544 }

1565 
1566 /**
1567  * Finds a path between two locations.
1568  * - Arg 1: source location. (Or Arg 1: unit.)
1569  * - Arg 2: destination.
1570  * - Arg 3: optional cost function or
1571  *          table (optional fields: ignore_units, ignore_teleport, max_cost, viewing_side).
1572  * - Ret 1: array of pairs containing path steps.
1573  * - Ret 2: path cost.
1574  */
1575 int game_lua_kernel::intf_find_path(lua_State *L)
1576 {
1577         int arg = 1;
1578         map_location src, dst;
1579         const unit* u = nullptr;
1580 
1581         if (lua_isuserdata(L, arg))
1582         {
1583                 u = &luaW_checkunit(L, arg);
1584                 src = u->get_location();
1585                 ++arg;
1586         }
1587         else
1588         {
1589                 src = luaW_checklocation(L, arg);
1590                 unit_map::const_unit_iterator ui = units().find(src);
1591                 if (ui.valid()) {
1592                         u = ui.get_shared_ptr().get();
1593                 }
1594                 ++arg;
1595         }
1596 
1597         dst = luaW_checklocation(L, arg);
1598         ++arg;
1599 
1600         if (!board().map().on_board(src))
1601                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid location");
1602         if (!board().map().on_board(dst))
1603                 return luaL_argerror(L, arg - 2, "invalid location");
1604 
1605         const gamemap &map = board().map();
1606         int viewing_side = 0;
1607         bool ignore_units = false, see_all = false, ignore_teleport = false;
1608         double stop_at = 10000;
1609         std::unique_ptr<pathfind::cost_calculator> calc;
1610 
1611         if (lua_istable(L, arg))
1612         {
1613                 lua_pushstring(L, "ignore_units");
1614                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1615                 ignore_units = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
1616                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1617 
1618                 lua_pushstring(L, "ignore_teleport");
1619                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1620                 ignore_teleport = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
1621                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1622 
1623                 lua_pushstring(L, "max_cost");
1624                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1625                 if (!lua_isnil(L, -1))
1626                         stop_at = luaL_checknumber(L, -1);
1627                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1628 
1629                 lua_pushstring(L, "viewing_side");
1630                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1631                 if (!lua_isnil(L, -1)) {
1632                         int i = luaL_checkinteger(L, -1);
1633                         if (i >= 1 && i <= int(teams().size())) viewing_side = i;
1634                         else see_all = true;
1635                 }
1636                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1637         }
1638         else if (lua_isfunction(L, arg))
1639         {
1640                 calc.reset(new lua_pathfind_cost_calculator(L, arg));
1641         }
1642 
1643         pathfind::teleport_map teleport_locations;
1644 
1645         if (!calc) {
1646                 if (!u) return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "unit not found");
1647 
1648                 const team& viewing_team = viewing_side
1649                         ? board().get_team(viewing_side)
1650                         : board().get_team(u->side());
1651 
1652                 if (!ignore_teleport) {
1653                         teleport_locations = pathfind::get_teleport_locations(
1654                                 *u, viewing_team, see_all, ignore_units);
1655                 }
1656                 calc.reset(new pathfind::shortest_path_calculator(*u, viewing_team,
1657                         teams(), map, ignore_units, false, see_all));
1658         }
1659 
1660         pathfind::plain_route res = pathfind::a_star_search(src, dst, stop_at, *calc, map.w(), map.h(),
1661                 &teleport_locations);
1662 
1663         int nb = res.steps.size();
1664         lua_createtable(L, nb, 0);
1665         for (int i = 0; i < nb; ++i)
1666         {
1667                 lua_createtable(L, 2, 0);
1668                 lua_pushinteger(L, res.steps[i].wml_x());
1669                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 1);
1670                 lua_pushinteger(L, res.steps[i].wml_y());
1671                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 2);
1672                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, i + 1);
1673         }
1674         lua_pushinteger(L, res.move_cost);
1675 
1676         return 2;
1677 }
1678 
1679 /**
1680  * Finds all the locations reachable by a unit.
1681  * - Arg 1: source location OR unit.
1682  * - Arg 2: optional table (optional fields: ignore_units, ignore_teleport, additional_turns, viewing_side).
1683  * - Ret 1: array of triples (coordinates + remaining movement).
1684  */
1685 int game_lua_kernel::intf_find_reach(lua_State *L)
1686 {
1687         int arg = 1;
1688         const unit* u = nullptr;
1689 
1690         if (lua_isuserdata(L, arg))
1691         {
1692                 u = &luaW_checkunit(L, arg);
1693                 ++arg;
1694         }
1695         else
1696         {
1697                 map_location src = luaW_checklocation(L, arg);
1698                 unit_map::const_unit_iterator ui = units().find(src);
1699                 if (!ui.valid())
1700                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "unit not found");
1701                 u = ui.get_shared_ptr().get();
1702                 ++arg;
1703         }
1704 
1705         int viewing_side = 0;
1706         bool ignore_units = false, see_all = false, ignore_teleport = false;
1707         int additional_turns = 0;
1708 
1709         if (lua_istable(L, arg))
1710         {
1711                 lua_pushstring(L, "ignore_units");
1712                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1713                 ignore_units = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
1714                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1715 
1716                 lua_pushstring(L, "ignore_teleport");
1717                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1718                 ignore_teleport = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
1719                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1720 
1721                 lua_pushstring(L, "additional_turns");
1722                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1723                 additional_turns = lua_tointeger(L, -1);
1724                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1725 
1726                 lua_pushstring(L, "viewing_side");
1727                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1728                 if (!lua_isnil(L, -1)) {
1729                         int i = luaL_checkinteger(L, -1);
1730                         if (i >= 1 && i <= int(teams().size())) viewing_side = i;
1731                         else see_all = true;
1732                 }
1733                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1734         }
1735 
1736         const team& viewing_team = viewing_side
1737                 ? board().get_team(viewing_side)
1738                 : board().get_team(u->side());
1739 
1740         pathfind::paths res(*u, ignore_units, !ignore_teleport,
1741                 viewing_team, additional_turns, see_all, ignore_units);
1742 
1743         int nb = res.destinations.size();
1744         lua_createtable(L, nb, 0);
1745         for (int i = 0; i < nb; ++i)
1746         {
1747                 pathfind::paths::step &s = res.destinations[i];
1748                 lua_createtable(L, 2, 0);
1749                 lua_pushinteger(L, s.curr.wml_x());
1750                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 1);
1751                 lua_pushinteger(L, s.curr.wml_y());
1752                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 2);
1753                 lua_pushinteger(L, s.move_left);
1754                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 3);
1755                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, i + 1);
1756         }
1757 
1758         return 1;
1759 }
1760 
1761 static bool intf_find_cost_map_helper(const unit * ptr) {
1762         return ptr->get_location().valid();
1763 }
1764 
1765 template<typename T> // This is only a template so I can avoid typing out the long typename. >_>
1766 static int load_fake_units(lua_State* L, int arg, T& fake_units)
1767 {
1768         for (int i = 1, i_end = lua_rawlen(L, arg); i <= i_end; ++i)
1769         {
1770                 map_location src;
1771                 lua_rawgeti(L, arg, i);
1772                 int entry = lua_gettop(L);
1773                 if (!lua_istable(L, entry)) {
1774                         goto error;
1775                 }
1776 
1777                 if (!luaW_tolocation(L, entry, src)) {
1778                         goto error;
1779                 }
1780 
1781                 lua_rawgeti(L, entry, 3);
1782                 if (!lua_isnumber(L, -1)) {
1783                         lua_getfield(L, entry, "side");
1784                         if (!lua_isnumber(L, -1)) {
1785                                 goto error;
1786                         }
1787                 }
1788                 int side = lua_tointeger(L, -1);
1789 
1790                 lua_rawgeti(L, entry, 4);
1791                 if (!lua_isstring(L, -1)) {
1792                         lua_getfield(L, entry, "type");
1793                         if (!lua_isstring(L, -1)) {
1794                                 goto error;
1795                         }
1796                 }
1797                 std::string unit_type = lua_tostring(L, -1);
1798 
1799                 fake_units.emplace_back(src, side, unit_type);
1800 
1801                 lua_settop(L, entry - 1);
1802         }
1803         return 0;
1804 error:
1805         return luaL_argerror(L, arg, "unit type table malformed - each entry should be either array of 4 elements or table with keys x, y, side, type");
1806 }
1807 
1808 /**
1809  * Is called with one or more units and builds a cost map.
1810  * - Arg 1: source location. (Or Arg 1: unit. Or Arg 1: table containing a filter)
1811  * - Arg 2: optional array of tables with 4 elements (coordinates + side + unit type string)
1812  * - Arg 3: optional table (optional fields: ignore_units, ignore_teleport, viewing_side, debug).
1813  * - Arg 4: optional table: standard location filter.
1814  * - Ret 1: array of triples (coordinates + array of tuples(summed cost + reach counter)).
1815  */
1816 int game_lua_kernel::intf_find_cost_map(lua_State *L)
1817 {
1818         int arg = 1;
1819         unit* unit = luaW_tounit(L, arg, true);
1820         vconfig filter = vconfig::unconstructed_vconfig();
1821         luaW_tovconfig(L, arg, filter);
1822 
1823         std::vector<const ::unit*> real_units;
1824         typedef std::vector<std::tuple<map_location, int, std::string> > unit_type_vector;
1825         unit_type_vector fake_units;
1826 
1827 
1828         if (unit)  // 1. arg - unit
1829         {
1830                 real_units.push_back(unit);
1831         }
1832         else if (!filter.null())  // 1. arg - filter
1833         {
1834                 filter_context & fc = game_state_;
1835                 boost::copy(unit_filter(filter, &fc).all_matches_on_map() | boost::adaptors::filtered(&intf_find_cost_map_helper), std::back_inserter(real_units));
1836         }
1837         else  // 1. arg - coordinates
1838         {
1839                 map_location src = luaW_checklocation(L, arg);
1840                 unit_map::const_unit_iterator ui = units().find(src);
1841                 if (ui.valid())
1842                 {
1843                         real_units.push_back(&(*ui));
1844                 }
1845         }
1846         ++arg;
1847 
1848         if (lua_istable(L, arg))  // 2. arg - optional types
1849         {
1850                 load_fake_units(L, arg, fake_units);
1851                 ++arg;
1852         }
1853 
1854         if(real_units.empty() && fake_units.empty())
1855         {
1856                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "unit(s) not found");
1857         }
1858 
1859         int viewing_side = 0;
1860         bool ignore_units = true, see_all = true, ignore_teleport = false, debug = false, use_max_moves = false;
1861 
1862         if (lua_istable(L, arg))  // 4. arg - options
1863         {
1864                 lua_pushstring(L, "ignore_units");
1865                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1866                 if (!lua_isnil(L, -1))
1867                 {
1868                         ignore_units = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
1869                 }
1870                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1871 
1872                 lua_pushstring(L, "ignore_teleport");
1873                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1874                 if (!lua_isnil(L, -1))
1875                 {
1876                         ignore_teleport = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
1877                 }
1878                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1879 
1880                 lua_pushstring(L, "viewing_side");
1881                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1882                 if (!lua_isnil(L, -1))
1883                 {
1884                         int i = luaL_checkinteger(L, -1);
1885                         if (i >= 1 && i <= int(teams().size()))
1886                         {
1887                                 viewing_side = i;
1888                                 see_all = false;
1889                         }
1890                 }
1891 
1892                 lua_pushstring(L, "debug");
1893                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1894                 if (!lua_isnil(L, -1))
1895                 {
1896                         debug = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
1897                 }
1898                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1899 
1900                 lua_pushstring(L, "use_max_moves");
1901                 lua_rawget(L, arg);
1902                 if (!lua_isnil(L, -1))
1903                 {
1904                         use_max_moves = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
1905                 }
1906                 lua_pop(L, 1);
1907                 ++arg;
1908         }
1909 
1910         // 5. arg - location filter
1911         filter = vconfig::unconstructed_vconfig();
1912         std::set<map_location> location_set;
1913         luaW_tovconfig(L, arg, filter);
1914         if (filter.null())
1915         {
1916                 filter = vconfig(config(), true);
1917         }
1918         filter_context & fc = game_state_;
1919         const terrain_filter t_filter(filter, &fc);
1920         t_filter.get_locations(location_set, true);
1921         ++arg;
1922 
1923         // build cost_map
1924         const team& viewing_team = viewing_side
1925                 ? board().get_team(viewing_side)
1926                 : board().teams()[0];
1927 
1928         pathfind::full_cost_map cost_map(
1929                         ignore_units, !ignore_teleport, viewing_team, see_all, ignore_units);
1930 
1931         for (const ::unit* const u : real_units)
1932         {
1933                 cost_map.add_unit(*u, use_max_moves);
1934         }
1935         for (const unit_type_vector::value_type& fu : fake_units)
1936         {
1937                 const unit_type* ut = unit_types.find(std::get<2>(fu));
1938                 cost_map.add_unit(std::get<0>(fu), ut, std::get<1>(fu));
1939         }
1940 
1941         if (debug)
1942         {
1943                 if (game_display_) {
1944                         game_display_->labels().clear_all();
1945                         for (const map_location& loc : location_set)
1946                         {
1947                                 std::stringstream s;
1948                                 s << cost_map.get_pair_at(loc.x, loc.y).first;
1949                                 s << " / ";
1950                                 s << cost_map.get_pair_at(loc.x, loc.y).second;
1951                                 game_display_->labels().set_label(loc, s.str());
1952                         }
1953                 }
1954         }
1955 
1956         // create return value
1957         lua_createtable(L, location_set.size(), 0);
1958         int counter = 1;
1959         for (const map_location& loc : location_set)
1960         {
1961                 lua_createtable(L, 4, 0);
1962 
1963                 lua_pushinteger(L, loc.wml_x());
1964                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 1);
1965 
1966                 lua_pushinteger(L, loc.wml_y());
1967                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 2);
1968 
1969                 lua_pushinteger(L, cost_map.get_pair_at(loc.x, loc.y).first);
1970                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 3);
1971 
1972                 lua_pushinteger(L, cost_map.get_pair_at(loc.x, loc.y).second);
1973                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 4);
1974 
1975                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, counter);
1976                 ++counter;
1977         }
1978         return 1;
1979 }
1980 
1981 int game_lua_kernel::intf_print(lua_State *L) {
1982         vconfig cfg(luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1));
1983 
1984         // Remove any old message.
1985         static int floating_label = 0;
1986         if (floating_label)
1987                 font::remove_floating_label(floating_label);
1988 
1989         // Display a message on-screen
1990         std::string text = cfg["text"];
1991         if(text.empty() || !game_display_)
1992                 return 0;
1993 
1994         int size = cfg["size"].to_int(font::SIZE_SMALL);
1995         int lifetime = cfg["duration"].to_int(50);
1996 
1997         color_t color = font::LABEL_COLOR;
1998 
1999         if(!cfg["color"].empty()) {
2000                 color = color_t::from_rgb_string(cfg["color"]);
2001         } else if(cfg.has_attribute("red") || cfg.has_attribute("green") || cfg.has_attribute("blue")) {
2002                 color = color_t(cfg["red"], cfg["green"], cfg["blue"]);
2003         }
2004 
2005         const SDL_Rect& rect = game_display_->map_outside_area();
2006 
2007         font::floating_label flabel(text);
2008         flabel.set_font_size(size);
2009         flabel.set_color(color);
2010         flabel.set_position(rect.w/2,rect.h/2);
2011         flabel.set_lifetime(lifetime);
2012         flabel.set_clip_rect(rect);
2013 
2014         floating_label = font::add_floating_label(flabel);
2015 
2016         return 0;
2017 }
2018 
2019 void game_lua_kernel::put_unit_helper(const map_location& loc)
2020 {
2021         if(game_display_) {
2022                 game_display_->invalidate(loc);
2023         }
2024 
2025         units().erase(loc);
2026 }
2027 
2028 /**
2029  * Places a unit on the map.
2030  * - Arg 1: (optional) location.
2031  * - Arg 2: Unit (WML table or proxy), or nothing/nil to delete.
2032  * OR
2033  * - Arg 1: Unit (WML table or proxy)
2034  * - Arg 2: (optional) location
2035  * - Arg 3: (optional) boolean
2036  */
2037 int game_lua_kernel::intf_put_unit(lua_State *L)
2038 {
2039         if(map_locked_) {
2040                 return luaL_error(L, "Attempted to move a unit while the map is locked");
2041         }
2042         int unit_arg = 1;
2043 
2044         map_location loc;
2045         if (lua_isnumber(L, 1)) {
2046                 // Since this form is deprecated, I didn't bother updating it to luaW_tolocation.
2047                 unit_arg = 3;
2048                 loc.set_wml_x(lua_tointeger(L, 1));
2049                 loc.set_wml_y(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
2050                 if (!map().on_board(loc)) {
2051                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid location");
2052                 }
2053         } else if (luaW_tolocation(L, 2, loc)) {
2054                 if (!map().on_board(loc)) {
2055                         return luaL_argerror(L, 2, "invalid location");
2056                 }
2057         }
2058 
2059         if((luaW_isunit(L, unit_arg))) {
2060                 lua_unit& u = *luaW_checkunit_ref(L, unit_arg);
2061                 if(u.on_map() && u->get_location() == loc) {
2062                         return 0;
2063                 }
2064                 if (!loc.valid()) {
2065                         loc = u->get_location();
2066                         if (!map().on_board(loc))
2067                                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid location");
2068                 } else if (unit_arg != 1) {
2069                         WRN_LUA << "wesnoth.put_unit(x, y, unit) is deprecated. Use wesnoth.put_unit(unit, x, y) instead\n";
2070                 }
2071                 put_unit_helper(loc);
2072                 u.put_map(loc);
2073                 u.get_shared()->anim_comp().set_standing();
2074         } else if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, unit_arg)) {
2075                 const vconfig* vcfg = nullptr;
2076                 config cfg = luaW_checkconfig(L, unit_arg, vcfg);
2077                 if (unit_arg == 1 && !map().on_board(loc)) {
2078                         loc.set_wml_x(cfg["x"]);
2079                         loc.set_wml_y(cfg["y"]);
2080                         if (!map().on_board(loc))
2081                                 return luaL_argerror(L, 2, "invalid location");
2082                 } else if (unit_arg != 1) {
2083                         WRN_LUA << "wesnoth.put_unit(x, y, unit) is deprecated. Use wesnoth.put_unit(unit, x, y) instead\n";
2084                 }
2085                 unit_ptr u(new unit(cfg, true, vcfg));
2086                 put_unit_helper(loc);
2087                 u->set_location(loc);
2088                 units().insert(u);
2089         } else {
2090                 WRN_LUA << "wesnoth.put_unit(x, y) is deprecated. Use wesnoth.erase_unit(x, y) instead\n";
2091                 put_unit_helper(loc);
2092                 return 0; // Don't fire event when unit is only erase
2093         }
2094 
2095         // Fire event if using the deprecated version or if the final argument is not false
2096         // If the final boolean argument is omitted, the actual final argument (the unit or location) will always yield true.
2097         if(unit_arg != 1 || luaW_toboolean(L, -1)) {
2098                 play_controller_.pump().fire("unit_placed", loc);
2099         }
2100         return 0;
2101 }
2102 
2103 /**
2104  * Erases a unit from the map
2105  * - Arg 1: Unit to erase OR Location to erase unit
2106  */
2107 int game_lua_kernel::intf_erase_unit(lua_State *L)
2108 {
2109         if(map_locked_) {
2110                 return luaL_error(L, "Attempted to remove a unit while the map is locked");
2111         }
2112         map_location loc;
2113 
2114         if(luaW_isunit(L, 1)) {
2115                 lua_unit& u = *luaW_checkunit_ref(L, 1);
2116                 if (u.on_map()) {
2117                         loc = u->get_location();
2118                         if (!map().on_board(loc)) {
2119                                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid location");
2120                         }
2121                 } else if (int side = u.on_recall_list()) {
2122                         team &t = board().get_team(side);
2123                         // Should it use underlying ID instead?
2124                         t.recall_list().erase_if_matches_id(u->id());
2125                 } else {
2126                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "can't erase private units");
2127                 }
2128         } else if (luaW_tolocation(L, 1, loc)) {
2129                 if (!map().on_board(loc)) {
2130                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid location");
2131                 }
2132         } else if (!lua_isnoneornil(L, 1)) {
2133                 config cfg = luaW_checkconfig(L, 1);
2134                 loc.set_wml_x(cfg["x"]);
2135                 loc.set_wml_y(cfg["y"]);
2136                 if (!map().on_board(loc)) {
2137                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid location");
2138                 }
2139         } else {
2140                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "expected unit or integer");
2141         }
2142 
2143         units().erase(loc);
2144         return 0;
2145 }
2146 
2147 /**
2148  * Puts a unit on a recall list.
2149  * - Arg 1: WML table or unit.
2150  * - Arg 2: (optional) side.
2151  */
2152 int game_lua_kernel::intf_put_recall_unit(lua_State *L)
2153 {
2154         if(map_locked_) {
2155                 return luaL_error(L, "Attempted to move a unit while the map is locked");
2156         }
2157         lua_unit *lu = nullptr;
2158         unit_ptr u = unit_ptr();
2159         int side = lua_tointeger(L, 2);
2160         if (unsigned(side) > teams().size()) side = 0;
2161 
2162         if(luaW_isunit(L, 1)) {
2163                 lu = luaW_checkunit_ref(L, 1);
2164                 u = lu->get_shared();
2165                 if(lu->on_recall_list() && lu->on_recall_list() == side) {
2166                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "unit already on recall list");
2167                 }
2168         } else {
2169                 const vconfig* vcfg = nullptr;
2170                 config cfg = luaW_checkconfig(L, 1, vcfg);
2171                 u = unit_ptr(new unit(cfg, true, vcfg));
2172         }
2173 
2174         if (!side) {
2175                 side = u->side();
2176         } else {
2177                 u->set_side(side);
2178         }
2179         team &t = board().get_team(side);
2180         // Avoid duplicates in the recall list.
2181         size_t uid = u->underlying_id();
2182         t.recall_list().erase_by_underlying_id(uid);
2183         t.recall_list().add(u);
2184         if (lu) {
2185                 if (lu->on_map())
2186                         units().erase(u->get_location());
2187                 lu->lua_unit::~lua_unit();
2188                 new(lu) lua_unit(side, uid);
2189         }
2190 
2191         return 0;
2192 }
2193 
2194 /**
2195  * Extracts a unit from the map or a recall list and gives it to Lua.
2196  * - Arg 1: unit userdata.
2197  */
2198 int game_lua_kernel::intf_extract_unit(lua_State *L)
2199 {
2200         if(map_locked_) {
2201                 return luaL_error(L, "Attempted to remove a unit while the map is locked");
2202         }
2203         lua_unit* lu = luaW_checkunit_ref(L, 1);
2204         unit_ptr u = lu->get_shared();
2205 
2206         if (lu->on_map()) {
2207                 u = units().extract(u->get_location());
2208                 assert(u);
2209                 u->anim_comp().clear_haloes();
2210         } else if (int side = lu->on_recall_list()) {
2211                 team &t = board().get_team(side);
2212                 unit_ptr v = unit_ptr(new unit(*u));
2213                 t.recall_list().erase_if_matches_id(u->id());
2214                 u = v;
2215         } else {
2216                 return 0;
2217         }
2218 
2219         lu->lua_unit::~lua_unit();
2220         new(lu) lua_unit(u);
2221         return 0;
2222 }

2224 /**
2225  * Finds a vacant tile.
2226  * - Arg 1: location.
2227  * - Arg 2: optional unit for checking movement type.
2228  * - Rets 1,2: location.
2229  */
2230 int game_lua_kernel::intf_find_vacant_tile(lua_State *L)
2231 {
2232         map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 1);
2233 
2234         unit_ptr u;
2235         if (!lua_isnoneornil(L, 2)) {
2236                 if(luaW_isunit(L, 2)) {
2237                         u = luaW_checkunit_ptr(L, 2, false);
2238                 } else {
2239                         const vconfig* vcfg = nullptr;
2240                         config cfg = luaW_checkconfig(L, 2, vcfg);
2241                         u.reset(new unit(cfg, false, vcfg));
2242                 }
2243         }
2244 
2245         map_location res = find_vacant_tile(loc, pathfind::VACANT_ANY, u.get());
2246 
2247         if (!res.valid()) return 0;
2248         lua_pushinteger(L, res.wml_x());
2249         lua_pushinteger(L, res.wml_y());
2250         return 2;
2251 }

2414 /**
2415  * Puts a table at the top of the stack with some combat result.
2416  */
2417 static void luaW_pushsimdata(lua_State *L, const combatant &cmb)
2418 {
2419         int n = cmb.hp_dist.size();
2420         lua_createtable(L, 0, 4);
2421         lua_pushnumber(L, cmb.poisoned);
2422         lua_setfield(L, -2, "poisoned");
2423         lua_pushnumber(L, cmb.slowed);
2424         lua_setfield(L, -2, "slowed");
2425         lua_pushnumber(L, cmb.untouched);
2426         lua_setfield(L, -2, "untouched");
2427         lua_pushnumber(L, cmb.average_hp());
2428         lua_setfield(L, -2, "average_hp");
2429         lua_createtable(L, n, 0);
2430         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
2431                 lua_pushnumber(L, cmb.hp_dist[i]);
2432                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, i);
2433         }
2434         lua_setfield(L, -2, "hp_chance");
2435 }
2436 
2437 /**
2438  * Puts a table at the top of the stack with information about the combatants' weapons.
2439  */
2440 static void luaW_pushsimweapon(lua_State *L, const battle_context_unit_stats &bcustats)
2441 {
2442 
2443         lua_createtable(L, 0, 16);
2444 
2445         lua_pushnumber(L, bcustats.num_blows);
2446         lua_setfield(L, -2, "num_blows");
2447         lua_pushnumber(L, bcustats.damage);
2448         lua_setfield(L, -2, "damage");
2449         lua_pushnumber(L, bcustats.chance_to_hit);
2450         lua_setfield(L, -2, "chance_to_hit");
2451         lua_pushboolean(L, bcustats.poisons);
2452         lua_setfield(L, -2, "poisons");
2453         lua_pushboolean(L, bcustats.slows);
2454         lua_setfield(L, -2, "slows");
2455         lua_pushboolean(L, bcustats.petrifies);
2456         lua_setfield(L, -2, "petrifies");
2457         lua_pushboolean(L, bcustats.plagues);
2458         lua_setfield(L, -2, "plagues");
2459         lua_pushstring(L, bcustats.plague_type.c_str());
2460         lua_setfield(L, -2, "plague_type");
2461         lua_pushboolean(L, bcustats.backstab_pos);
2462         lua_setfield(L, -2, "backstabs");
2463         lua_pushnumber(L, bcustats.rounds);
2464         lua_setfield(L, -2, "rounds");
2465         lua_pushboolean(L, bcustats.firststrike);
2466         lua_setfield(L, -2, "firststrike");
2467         lua_pushboolean(L, bcustats.drains);
2468         lua_setfield(L, -2, "drains");
2469         lua_pushnumber(L, bcustats.drain_constant);
2470         lua_setfield(L, -2, "drain_constant");
2471         lua_pushnumber(L, bcustats.drain_percent);
2472         lua_setfield(L, -2, "drain_percent");
2473 
2474 
2475         //if we called simulate_combat without giving an explicit weapon this can be useful.
2476         lua_pushnumber(L, bcustats.attack_num);
2477         lua_setfield(L, -2, "attack_num"); // DEPRECATED
2478         lua_pushnumber(L, bcustats.attack_num + 1);
2479         lua_setfield(L, -2, "number");
2480         //this is nullptr when there is no counter weapon
2481         if(bcustats.weapon != nullptr)
2482         {
2483                 lua_pushstring(L, bcustats.weapon->id().c_str());
2484                 lua_setfield(L, -2, "name");
2485                 luaW_pushweapon(L, bcustats.weapon);
2486                 lua_setfield(L, -2, "weapon");
2487         }
2488 
2489 }

2491 /**
2492  * Simulates a combat between two units.
2493  * - Arg 1: attacker userdata.
2494  * - Arg 2: optional weapon index.
2495  * - Arg 3: defender userdata.
2496  * - Arg 4: optional weapon index.
2497  * - Ret 1: attacker results.
2498  * - Ret 2: defender results.
2499  * - Ret 3: info about the attacker weapon.
2500  * - Ret 4: info about the defender weapon.
2501  */
2502 int game_lua_kernel::intf_simulate_combat(lua_State *L)
2503 {
2504         int arg_num = 1, att_w = -1, def_w = -1;
2505 
2506         const unit& att = luaW_checkunit(L, arg_num);
2507         ++arg_num;
2508         if (lua_isnumber(L, arg_num)) {
2509                 att_w = lua_tointeger(L, arg_num) - 1;
2510                 if (att_w < 0 || att_w >= int(att.attacks().size()))
2511                         return luaL_argerror(L, arg_num, "weapon index out of bounds");
2512                 ++arg_num;
2513         }
2514 
2515         const unit& def = luaW_checkunit(L, arg_num, true);
2516         ++arg_num;
2517         if (lua_isnumber(L, arg_num)) {
2518                 def_w = lua_tointeger(L, arg_num) - 1;
2519                 if (def_w < 0 || def_w >= int(def.attacks().size()))
2520                         return luaL_argerror(L, arg_num, "weapon index out of bounds");
2521                 ++arg_num;
2522         }
2523 
2524         battle_context context(units(), att.get_location(),
2525                 def.get_location(), att_w, def_w, 0.0, nullptr, &att);
2526 
2527         luaW_pushsimdata(L, context.get_attacker_combatant());
2528         luaW_pushsimdata(L, context.get_defender_combatant());
2529         luaW_pushsimweapon(L, context.get_attacker_stats());
2530         luaW_pushsimweapon(L, context.get_defender_stats());
2531         return 4;
2532 }
