2565 /**
2566  * Gets/sets the current sound volume
2567  * - Arg 1: (optional) New volume to set
2568  * - Return: Original volume
2569  */
2570 static int intf_sound_volume(lua_State* L)
2571 {
2572         int vol = preferences::sound_volume();
2573         lua_pushnumber(L, sound::get_sound_volume() * 100.0f / vol);
2574         if(lua_isnumber(L, 1)) {
2575                 float rel = lua_tonumber(L, 1);
2576                 if(rel < 0.0f || rel > 100.0f) {
2577                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "volume must be in range 0..100");
2578                 }
2579                 vol = static_cast<int>(rel*vol / 100.0f);
2580                 sound::set_sound_volume(vol);
2581         }
2582         return 1;
2583 }

2585 /**
2586  * Scrolls to given tile.
2587  * - Arg 1: location.
2588  * - Arg 2: boolean preventing scroll to fog.
2589  * - Arg 3: boolean specifying whether to warp instantly.
2590  * - Arg 4: boolean specifying whether to skip if already onscreen
2591  */
2592 int game_lua_kernel::intf_scroll_to_tile(lua_State *L)
2593 {
2594         map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 1);
2595         bool check_fogged = luaW_toboolean(L, 2);
2596         game_display::SCROLL_TYPE scroll = luaW_toboolean(L, 4)
2597                 ? luaW_toboolean(L, 3)
2598                         ? game_display::ONSCREEN_WARP
2599                         : game_display::ONSCREEN
2600                 : luaW_toboolean(L, 3)
2601                         ? game_display::WARP
2602                         : game_display::SCROLL
2603         ;
2604         if (game_display_) {
2605                 game_display_->scroll_to_tile(loc, scroll, check_fogged);
2606         }
2607         return 0;
2608 }

2610 int game_lua_kernel::intf_select_hex(lua_State *L)
2611 {
2612         ERR_LUA << "wesnoth.select_hex is deprecated, use wesnoth.select_unit and/or wesnoth.highlight_hex" << std::endl;
2613 
2614         // Need this because check_location may change the stack
2615         // By doing this now, we ensure that it won't do so when
2616         // intf_select_unit and intf_highlight_hex call it.
2617         const map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 1);
2618         luaW_pushlocation(L, loc);
2619         lua_replace(L, 1);
2620 
2621         intf_select_unit(L);
2622         if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, 2) && luaW_toboolean(L,2)) {
2623                 intf_highlight_hex(L);
2624         }
2625         return 0;
2626 }

2628 /**
2629  * Selects and highlights the given location on the map.
2630  * - Arg 1: location.
2631  * - Args 2,3: booleans
2632  */
2633 int game_lua_kernel::intf_select_unit(lua_State *L)
2634 {
2635         if(lua_isnoneornil(L, 1)) {
2636                 play_controller_.get_mouse_handler_base().select_hex(map_location::null_location(), false, false, false);
2637                 return 0;
2638         }
2639         const map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 1);
2640         if(!map().on_board(loc)) return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "not on board");
2641         bool highlight = true;
2642         if(!lua_isnoneornil(L, 2))
2643                 highlight = luaW_toboolean(L, 2);
2644         const bool fire_event = luaW_toboolean(L, 3);
2645         play_controller_.get_mouse_handler_base().select_hex(
2646                 loc, false, highlight, fire_event);
2647         return 0;
2648 }

2689 
2690 namespace
2691 {
2692         struct lua_synchronize : mp_sync::user_choice
2693         {
2694                 lua_State *L;
2695                 int user_choice_index;
2696                 int random_choice_index;
2697                 int ai_choice_index;
2698                 std::string  desc;
2699                 lua_synchronize(lua_State *l, const std::string& descr, int user_index, int random_index = 0, int ai_index = 0)
2700                         : L(l)
2701                         , user_choice_index(user_index)
2702                         , random_choice_index(random_index)
2703                         , ai_choice_index(ai_index != 0 ? ai_index : user_index)
2704                         , desc(descr)
2705                 {}
2706 
2707                 virtual config query_user(int side) const override
2708                 {
2709                         bool is_local_ai = lua_kernel_base::get_lua_kernel<game_lua_kernel>(L).board().get_team(side).is_local_ai();
2710                         config cfg;
2711                         query_lua(side, is_local_ai ? ai_choice_index : user_choice_index, cfg);
2712                         return cfg;
2713                 }
2714 
2715                 virtual config random_choice(int side) const override
2716                 {
2717                         config cfg;
2718                         if(random_choice_index != 0 && lua_isfunction(L, random_choice_index)) {
2719                                 query_lua(side, random_choice_index, cfg);
2720                         }
2721                         return cfg;
2722                 }
2723 
2724                 virtual std::string description() const override
2725                 {
2726                         return desc;
2727                 }
2728 
2729                 void query_lua(int side, int function_index, config& cfg) const
2730                 {
2731                         assert(cfg.empty());
2732                         lua_pushvalue(L, function_index);
2733                         lua_pushnumber(L, side);
2734                         if (luaW_pcall(L, 1, 1, false)) {
2735                                 if(!luaW_toconfig(L, -1, cfg)) {
2736                                         lua_kernel_base::get_lua_kernel<game_lua_kernel>(L).log_error("function returned to wesnoth.synchronize_choice a table which was partially invalid");
2737                                 }
2738                         }
2739                 }
2740                 //Although luas sync_choice can show a dialog, (and will in most cases)
2741                 //we return false to enable other possible things that do not contain UI things.
2742                 //it's in the responsibility of the umc dev to not show dialogs during prestart events.
2743                 virtual bool is_visible() const override { return false; }
2744         };
2745 }//unnamed namespace for lua_synchronize
2746 
2747 /**
2748  * Ensures a value is synchronized among all the clients.
2749  * - Arg 1: optional string specifying the type id of the choice.
2750  * - Arg 2: function to compute the value, called if the client is the master.
2751  * - Arg 3: optional function, called instead of the first function if the user is not human.
2752  * - Arg 4: optional integer  specifying, on which side the function should be evaluated.
2753  * - Ret 1: WML table returned by the function.
2754  */
2755 static int intf_synchronize_choice(lua_State *L)
2756 {
2757         std::string tagname = "input";
2758         t_string desc = _("input");
2759         int human_func = 0;
2760         int ai_func = 0;
2761         int side_for;
2762 
2763         int nextarg = 1;
2764         if(!lua_isfunction(L, nextarg) && luaW_totstring(L, nextarg, desc) ) {
2765                 ++nextarg;
2766         }
2767         if(lua_isfunction(L, nextarg)) {
2768                 human_func = nextarg++;
2769         }
2770         else {
2771                 return luaL_argerror(L, nextarg, "expected a function");
2772         }
2773         if(lua_isfunction(L, nextarg)) {
2774                 ai_func = nextarg++;
2775         }
2776         side_for = lua_tointeger(L, nextarg);
2777 
2778         config cfg = mp_sync::get_user_choice(tagname, lua_synchronize(L, desc, human_func, 0, ai_func), side_for);
2779         luaW_pushconfig(L, cfg);
2780         return 1;
2781 }
2782 /**
2783  * Ensures a value is synchronized among all the clients.
2784  * - Arg 1: optional string the id of this type of user input, may only contain chracters a-z and '_'
2785  * - Arg 2: function to compute the value, called if the client is the master.
2786  * - Arg 3: an optional function to compute the value, if the side was null/empty controlled.
2787  * - Arg 4: an array of integers specifying, on which side the function should be evaluated.
2788  * - Ret 1: a map int -> WML tabls.
2789  */
2790 static int intf_synchronize_choices(lua_State *L)
2791 {
2792         std::string tagname = "input";
2793         t_string desc = _("input");
2794         int human_func = 0;
2795         int null_func = 0;
2796         std::vector<int> sides_for;
2797 
2798         int nextarg = 1;
2799         if(!lua_isfunction(L, nextarg) && luaW_totstring(L, nextarg, desc) ) {
2800                 ++nextarg;
2801         }
2802         if(lua_isfunction(L, nextarg)) {
2803                 human_func = nextarg++;
2804         }
2805         else {
2806                 return luaL_argerror(L, nextarg, "expected a function");
2807         }
2808         if(lua_isfunction(L, nextarg)) {
2809                 null_func = nextarg++;
2810         };
2811         sides_for = lua_check<std::vector<int> >(L, nextarg++);
2812 
2813         lua_push(L, mp_sync::get_user_choice_multiple_sides(tagname, lua_synchronize(L, desc, human_func, null_func), std::set<int>(sides_for.begin(), sides_for.end())));
2814         return 1;
2815 }

2831 /**
2832  * Gets all the locations matching a given filter.
2833  * - Arg 1: WML table.
2834  * - Arg 2: Optional reference unit (teleport_unit)
2835  * - Ret 1: array of integer pairs.
2836  */
2837 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_locations(lua_State *L)
2838 {
2839         vconfig filter = luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1);
2840 
2841         std::set<map_location> res;
2842         filter_context & fc = game_state_;
2843         const terrain_filter t_filter(filter, &fc);
2844         if(luaW_isunit(L, 2)) {
2845                 t_filter.get_locations(res, *luaW_tounit(L, 2), true);
2846         } else {
2847                 t_filter.get_locations(res, true);
2848         }
2849 
2850         lua_createtable(L, res.size(), 0);
2851         int i = 1;
2852         for (map_location const &loc : res)
2853         {
2854                 lua_createtable(L, 2, 0);
2855                 lua_pushinteger(L, loc.wml_x());
2856                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 1);
2857                 lua_pushinteger(L, loc.wml_y());
2858                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 2);
2859                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, i);
2860                 ++i;
2861         }
2862         return 1;
2863 }

2896  * - Arg 1: location.

2898  * - Arg 3: Optional reference unit (teleport_unit)
2899  * - Ret 1: boolean.
2900  */

2902 {

2904         vconfig filter = luaW_checkvconfig(L, 2, true);
2905 
2906         if (filter.null()) {
2907                 lua_pushboolean(L, true);
2908                 return 1;
2909         }
2910 
2911         filter_context & fc = game_state_;
2912         const terrain_filter t_filter(filter, &fc);
2913         if(luaW_isunit(L, 3)) {
2914                 lua_pushboolean(L, t_filter.match(loc, *luaW_tounit(L, 3)));
2915         } else {

2923 /**
2924  * Matches a side against the given filter.
2925  * - Args 1: side number.
2926  * - Arg 2: WML table.
2927  * - Ret 1: boolean.
2928  */
2929 int game_lua_kernel::intf_match_side(lua_State *L)
2930 {
2931         vconfig filter = luaW_checkvconfig(L, 2, true);
2932 
2933         if (filter.null()) {
2934                 lua_pushboolean(L, true);
2935                 return 1;
2936         }
2937 
2938         filter_context & fc = game_state_;
2939         side_filter s_filter(filter, &fc);
2940 
2941         if(team* t = luaW_toteam(L, 1)) {
2942                 lua_pushboolean(L, s_filter.match(*t));
2943         } else {
2944                 unsigned side = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1) - 1;
2945                 if (side >= teams().size()) return 0;
2946                 lua_pushboolean(L, s_filter.match(side + 1));
2947         }

2950 
2951 int game_lua_kernel::intf_set_side_id(lua_State *L)
2952 {
2953         int team_i = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1) - 1;
2954         std::string flag = luaL_optlstring(L, 2, "", nullptr);
2955         std::string color = luaL_optlstring(L, 3, "", nullptr);
2956 
2957         if(flag.empty() && color.empty()) {
2958                 return 0;
2959         }
2960         if(team_i < 0 || static_cast<size_t>(team_i) >= teams().size()) {
2961                 return luaL_error(L, "set_side_id: side number %d out of range", team_i);
2962         }
2963         team& side = teams()[team_i];
2964 
2965         if(!color.empty()) {
2966                 side.set_color(color);
2967         }
2968         if(!flag.empty()) {
2969                 side.set_flag(flag);
2970         }
2971 
2972         game_display_->reinit_flags_for_side(team_i);
2973         return 0;
2974 }

2976 static int intf_modify_ai(lua_State *L, const char* action)
2977 {
2978         int side_num = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1);
2979         std::string path = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
2980         config cfg {
2981                 "action", action,
2982                 "path", path
2983         };
2984         if(strcmp(action, "delete") == 0) {
2985                 ai::manager::modify_active_ai_for_side(side_num, cfg);
2986                 return 0;
2987         }
2988         config component = luaW_checkconfig(L, 3);
2989         size_t len = std::string::npos, open_brak = path.find_last_of('[');
2990         size_t dot = path.find_last_of('.');
2991         if(open_brak != len) {
2992                 len = open_brak - dot - 1;
2993         }
2994         cfg.add_child(path.substr(dot + 1, len), component);
2995         ai::manager::modify_active_ai_for_side(side_num, cfg);
2996         return 0;
2997 }

2999 static int intf_switch_ai(lua_State *L)
3000 {
3001         int side_num = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1);
3002         if(lua_isstring(L, 2)) {
3003                 std::string file = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
3004                 if(!ai::manager::add_ai_for_side_from_file(side_num, file)) {
3005                         std::string err = formatter() << "Could not load AI for side " << side_num << " from file " << file;
3006                         lua_pushlstring(L, err.c_str(), err.length());
3007                         return lua_error(L);
3008                 }
3009         } else {
3010                 ai::manager::add_ai_for_side_from_config(side_num, luaW_checkconfig(L, 2));
3011         }
3012         return 0;
3013 }
3014 
3015 static int intf_append_ai(lua_State *L)
3016 {
3017         int side_num = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1);
3018         config cfg = luaW_checkconfig(L, 2);
3019         if(!cfg.has_child("ai")) {
3020                 cfg = config {"ai", cfg};
3021         }
3022         bool added_dummy_stage = false;
3023         if(!cfg.child("ai").has_child("stage")) {
3024                 added_dummy_stage = true;
3025                 cfg.child("ai").add_child("stage", config {"name", "empty"});
3026         }
3027         ai::configuration::expand_simplified_aspects(side_num, cfg);
3028         if(added_dummy_stage) {
3029                 for(auto iter = cfg.ordered_begin(); iter != cfg.ordered_end(); iter++) {
3030                         if(iter->key == "stage" && iter->cfg["name"] == "empty") {
3031                                 iter = cfg.erase(iter);
3032                         }
3033                 }
3034         }
3035         ai::manager::append_active_ai_for_side(side_num, cfg.child("ai"));
3036         return 0;
3037 }

3039 /**
3040  * Returns a proxy table array for all sides matching the given SSF.
3041  * - Arg 1: SSF
3042  * - Ret 1: proxy table array
3043  */
3044 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_sides(lua_State* L)
3045 {
3046         LOG_LUA << "intf_get_sides called: this = " << std::hex << this << std::dec << " myname = " << my_name() << std::endl;
3047         std::vector<int> sides;
3048         const vconfig ssf = luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1, true);
3049         if(ssf.null()) {
3050                 for (unsigned side_number = 1; side_number <= teams().size(); ++side_number) {
3051                         sides.push_back(side_number);
3052                 }
3053         } else {
3054                 filter_context & fc = game_state_;
3055 
3056                 side_filter filter(ssf, &fc);
3057                 sides = filter.get_teams();
3058         }
3059 
3060         lua_settop(L, 0);
3061         lua_createtable(L, sides.size(), 0);
3062         unsigned index = 1;
3063         for(int side : sides) {
3064                 luaW_pushteam(L, board().get_team(side));
3065                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, index);
3066                 ++index;
3067         }
3068 
3069         return 1;
3070 }

3072 /**
3073  * .Returns information about the global traits known to the engine.
3074  * - Ret 1: Table with named fields holding wml tables describing the traits.
3075  */
3076 static int intf_get_traits(lua_State* L)
3077 {
3078         lua_newtable(L);
3079         for(const config& trait : unit_types.traits()) {
3080                 const std::string& id = trait["id"];
3081                 //It seems the engine does nowhere check the id field for emptyness or duplicates
3082                 //(also not later on).
3083                 //However, the worst thing to happen is that the trait read later overwrites the older one,
3084                 //and this is not the right place for such checks.
3085                 lua_pushstring(L, id.c_str());
3086                 luaW_pushconfig(L, trait);
3087                 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3088         }
3089         return 1;
3090 }

3092 /**
3093  * Adds a modification to a unit.
3094  * - Arg 1: unit.
3095  * - Arg 2: string.
3096  * - Arg 3: WML table.
3097  * - Arg 4: (optional) Whether to add to [modifications] - default true
3098  */
3099 static int intf_add_modification(lua_State *L)
3100 {
3101         unit& u = luaW_checkunit(L, 1);
3102         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
3103         std::string sm = m;
3104         if (sm == "advance") { // Maintain backwards compatibility
3105                 sm = "advancement";
3106                 lg::wml_error() << "(Lua) Modifications of type \"advance\" are deprecated, use \"advancement\" instead\n";
3107         }
3108         if (sm != "advancement" && sm != "object" && sm != "trait") {
3109                 return luaL_argerror(L, 2, "unknown modification type");
3110         }
3111         bool write_to_mods = true;
3112         if (!lua_isnone(L, 4)) {
3113                 write_to_mods = luaW_toboolean(L, 4);
3114         }
3115         if(sm.empty()) {
3116                 write_to_mods = false;
3117         }
3118 
3119         config cfg = luaW_checkconfig(L, 3);
3120         u.add_modification(sm, cfg, !write_to_mods);
3121         return 0;
3122 }

3124 /**
3125  * Removes modifications from a unit
3126  * - Arg 1: unit
3127  * - Arg 2: table (filter as [filter_wml])
3128  * - Arg 3: type of modification (default "object")
3129  */
3130 static int intf_remove_modifications(lua_State *L)
3131 {
3132         unit& u = luaW_checkunit(L, 1);
3133         config filter = luaW_checkconfig(L, 2);
3134         std::string tag = luaL_optstring(L, 3, "object");
3135         //TODO
3136         if(filter.attribute_count() == 1 && filter.all_children_count() == 0 && filter.attribute_range().front().first == "duration") {
3137                 u.expire_modifications(filter["duration"]);
3138         } else {
3139                 for(config& obj : u.get_modifications().child_range(tag)) {
3140                         if(obj.matches(filter)) {
3141                                 obj["duration"] = "now";
3142                         }
3143                 }
3144                 u.expire_modifications("now");
3145         }
3146         return 0;
3147 }

3227 int game_lua_kernel::intf_log_replay(lua_State* L) {
3228         replay& recorder = play_controller_.get_replay();
3229         const int nargs = lua_gettop(L);
3230         if(nargs < 2 || nargs > 3) {
3231                 return luaL_error(L, "Wrong number of arguments to ai.log_replay() - should be 2 or 3 arguments.");
3232         }
3233         const std::string key = nargs == 2 ? luaL_checkstring(L, 1) : luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
3234         config cfg;
3235         if(nargs == 2) {
3236                 recorder.add_log_data(key, luaL_checkstring(L, 2));
3237         } else if(luaW_toconfig(L, 3, cfg)) {
3238                 recorder.add_log_data(luaL_checkstring(L, 1), key, cfg);
3239         } else if(!lua_isstring(L, 3)) {
3240                 return luaL_argerror(L, 3, "accepts only string or config");
3241         } else {
3242                 recorder.add_log_data(luaL_checkstring(L, 1), key, luaL_checkstring(L, 3));
3243         }
3244         return 0;
3245 }

3279 /**
3280  * Delays engine for a while.
3281  * - Arg 1: integer.
3282  * - Arg 2: boolean (optional).
3283  */
3284 int game_lua_kernel::intf_delay(lua_State *L)
3285 {
3286         lua_Integer delay = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1);
3287         if(delay == 0) {
3288                 play_controller_.play_slice(false);
3289                 return 0;
3290         }
3291         if(luaW_toboolean(L, 2) && game_display_ && game_display_->turbo_speed() > 0) {
3292                 delay /= game_display_->turbo_speed();
3293         }
3294         const unsigned final = SDL_GetTicks() + delay;
3295         do {
3296                 play_controller_.play_slice(false);
3297                 CVideo::delay(10);
3298         } while (int(final - SDL_GetTicks()) > 0);
3299         return 0;
3300 }

3317 int game_lua_kernel::intf_redraw(lua_State *L)
3318 {
3319         if (game_display_) {
3320                 game_display & screen = *game_display_;
3321 
3322                 vconfig cfg(luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1));
3323                 bool clear_shroud(luaW_toboolean(L, 2));
3324 
3325                 // We do this twice so any applicable redraws happen both before and after
3326                 // any events caused by redrawing shroud are fired
3327                 bool result = screen.maybe_rebuild();
3328                 if (!result) {
3329                         screen.invalidate_all();
3330                 }
3331 
3332                 if (clear_shroud) {
3333                         side_filter filter(cfg, &game_state_);
3334                         for (const int side : filter.get_teams()){
3335                                 actions::clear_shroud(side);
3336                         }
3337                         screen.recalculate_minimap();
3338                 }
3339 
3340                 result = screen.maybe_rebuild();
3341                 if (!result) {
3342                         screen.invalidate_all();
3343                 }
3344 
3345                 screen.draw(true,true);
3346         }
3347         return 0;
3348 }

3389 
3390 static void push_component(lua_State *L, ai::component* c, const std::string &ct = "")
3391 {
3392         lua_createtable(L, 0, 0); // Table for a component
3393 
3394         lua_pushstring(L, "name");
3395         lua_pushstring(L, c->get_name().c_str());
3396         lua_rawset(L, -3);
3397 
3398         lua_pushstring(L, "engine");
3399         lua_pushstring(L, c->get_engine().c_str());
3400         lua_rawset(L, -3);
3401 
3402         lua_pushstring(L, "id");
3403         lua_pushstring(L, c->get_id().c_str());
3404         lua_rawset(L, -3);
3405 
3406         if (ct == "candidate_action") {
3407                 lua_pushstring(L, "ca_ptr");
3408                 lua_pushlightuserdata(L, c);
3409                 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3410 
3411                 lua_pushstring(L, "exec");
3412                 lua_pushcclosure(L, &cfun_exec_candidate_action, 0);
3413                 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3414         }
3415 
3416         if (ct == "stage") {
3417                 lua_pushstring(L, "stg_ptr");
3418                 lua_pushlightuserdata(L, c);
3419                 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3420 
3421                 lua_pushstring(L, "exec");
3422                 lua_pushcclosure(L, &cfun_exec_stage, 0);
3423                 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3424         }
3425 
3426 
3427         std::vector<std::string> c_types = c->get_children_types();
3428 
3429         for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator t = c_types.begin(); t != c_types.end(); ++t)
3430         {
3431                 std::vector<ai::component*> children = c->get_children(*t);
3432                 std::string type = *t;
3433                 if (type == "aspect" || type == "goal" || type == "engine")
3434                 {
3435                         continue;
3436                 }
3437 
3438                 lua_pushstring(L, type.c_str());
3439                 lua_createtable(L, 0, 0); // this table will be on top of the stack during recursive calls
3440 
3441                 for (std::vector<ai::component*>::const_iterator i = children.begin(); i != children.end(); ++i)
3442                 {
3443                         lua_pushstring(L, (*i)->get_name().c_str());
3444                         push_component(L, *i, type);
3445                         lua_rawset(L, -3);
3446 
3447                         //if (type == "candidate_action")
3448                         //{
3449                         //      ai::candidate_action *ca = dynamic_cast<ai::candidate_action*>(*i);
3450                         //      ca->execute();
3451                         //}
3452                 }
3453 
3454                 lua_rawset(L, -3); // setting the child table
3455         }
3456 
3457 
3458 }
3459 
3460 /**
3461  * Debug access to the ai tables
3462  * - Arg 1: int
3463  * - Ret 1: ai table
3464  */
3465 static int intf_debug_ai(lua_State *L)
3466 {
3467         if (!game_config::debug) { // This function works in debug mode only
3468                 return 0;
3469         }
3470         int side = lua_tointeger(L, 1);
3471         lua_pop(L, 1);
3472 
3473         ai::component* c = ai::manager::get_active_ai_holder_for_side_dbg(side).get_component(nullptr, "");
3474 
3475         // Bad, but works
3476         std::vector<ai::component*> engines = c->get_children("engine");
3477         ai::engine_lua* lua_engine = nullptr;
3478         for (std::vector<ai::component*>::const_iterator i = engines.begin(); i != engines.end(); ++i)
3479         {
3480                 if ((*i)->get_name() == "lua")
3481                 {
3482                         lua_engine = dynamic_cast<ai::engine_lua *>(*i);
3483                 }
3484         }
3485 
3486         // Better way, but doesn't work
3487         //ai::component* e = ai::manager::get_active_ai_holder_for_side_dbg(side).get_component(c, "engine[lua]");
3488         //ai::engine_lua* lua_engine = dynamic_cast<ai::engine_lua *>(e);
3489 
3490         if (lua_engine == nullptr)
3491         {
3492                 //no lua engine is defined for this side.
3493                 //so set up a dummy engine
3494 
3495                 ai::ai_composite * ai_ptr = dynamic_cast<ai::ai_composite *>(c);
3496 
3497                 assert(ai_ptr);
3498 
3499                 ai::ai_context& ai_context = ai_ptr->get_ai_context();
3500                 config cfg = ai::configuration::get_default_ai_parameters();
3501 
3502                 lua_engine = new ai::engine_lua(ai_context, cfg);
3503                 LOG_LUA << "Created new dummy lua-engine for debug_ai(). \n";
3504 
3505                 //and add the dummy engine as a component
3506                 //to the manager, so we could use it later
3507                 cfg.add_child("engine", lua_engine->to_config());
3508                 ai::component_manager::add_component(c, "engine[]", cfg);
3509         }
3510 
3511         lua_engine->push_ai_table(); // stack: [-1: ai_context]
3512 
3513         lua_pushstring(L, "components");
3514         push_component(L, c); // stack: [-1: component tree; -2: ai context]
3515         lua_rawset(L, -3);
3516 
3517         return 1;
3518 }

3568 /// Replacing the current time of day schedule.
3569 int game_lua_kernel::intf_replace_schedule(lua_State * L)

3584 
3585 int game_lua_kernel::intf_set_time_of_day(lua_State * L)
3586 {
3587         if(!game_display_) {
3588                 return 0;
3589         }
3590         std::string area_id;
3591         size_t area_i = 0;
3592         if (lua_isstring(L, 2)) {
3593                 area_id = lua_tostring(L, 1);
3594                 std::vector<std::string> area_ids = tod_man().get_area_ids();
3595                 area_i = std::find(area_ids.begin(), area_ids.end(), area_id) - area_ids.begin();
3596                 if(area_i >= area_ids.size()) {
3597                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid time area ID");
3598                 }
3599         }
3600         int is_num = false;
3601         int new_time = lua_tonumberx(L, 1, &is_num) - 1;
3602         const std::vector<time_of_day>& times = area_id.empty()
3603                 ? tod_man().times()
3604                 : tod_man().times(area_i);
3605         int num_times = times.size();
3606         if(!is_num) {
3607                 std::string time_id = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
3608                 new_time = 0;
3609                 for(const time_of_day& time : times) {
3610                         if(time_id == time.id) {
3611                                 break;
3612                         }
3613                         new_time++;
3614                 }
3615                 if(new_time >= num_times) {
3616                         return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid time of day ID");
3617                 }
3618         }
3619         if(new_time < 0 || new_time >= num_times) {
3620                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, "invalid time of day index");
3621         }
3622 
3623         if(area_id.empty()) {
3624                 tod_man().set_current_time(new_time);
3625         } else {
3626                 tod_man().set_current_time(new_time, area_i);
3627         }
3628         return 0;
3629 }

3636                 game_display_->scroll(x, y, true);
3637                 game_display_->draw(true, true);
3638         }
3639 
3640         return 0;
3641 }

3643 namespace {
3644         struct lua_report_generator : reports::generator
3645         {
3646                 lua_State *mState;
3647                 std::string name;
3648                 lua_report_generator(lua_State *L, const std::string &n)
3649                         : mState(L), name(n) {}
3650                 virtual config generate(reports::context & rc);
3651         };
3652 
3653         config lua_report_generator::generate(reports::context & /*rc*/)
3654         {
3655                 lua_State *L = mState;
3656                 config cfg;
3657                 if (!luaW_getglobal(L, "wesnoth", "theme_items", name))
3658                         return cfg;
3659                 if (!luaW_pcall(L, 0, 1)) return cfg;
3660                 luaW_toconfig(L, -1, cfg);
3661                 lua_pop(L, 1);
3662                 return cfg;
3663         }
3664 }//unnamed namespace for lua_report_generator

3666 /**
3667  * Executes its upvalue as a theme item generator.
3668  */
3669 int game_lua_kernel::impl_theme_item(lua_State *L, std::string m)
3670 {
3671         reports::context temp_context = reports::context(board(), *game_display_, tod_man(), play_controller_.get_whiteboard(), play_controller_.get_mouse_handler_base());
3672         luaW_pushconfig(L, reports_.generate_report(m.c_str(), temp_context , true));
3673         return 1;
3674 }

3676 /**
3677  * Creates a field of the theme_items table and returns it (__index metamethod).
3678  */
3679 int game_lua_kernel::impl_theme_items_get(lua_State *L)
3680 {
3681         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
3682         lua_cpp::push_closure(L, std::bind(&game_lua_kernel::impl_theme_item, this, _1, std::string(m)), 0);
3683         lua_pushvalue(L, 2);
3684         lua_pushvalue(L, -2);
3685         lua_rawset(L, 1);
3686         reports_.register_generator(m, new lua_report_generator(L, m));
3687         return 1;
3688 }
3689 
3690 /**
3691  * Sets a field of the theme_items table (__newindex metamethod).
3692  */
3693 int game_lua_kernel::impl_theme_items_set(lua_State *L)
3694 {
3695         char const *m = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
3696         lua_pushvalue(L, 2);
3697         lua_pushvalue(L, 3);
3698         lua_rawset(L, 1);
3699         reports_.register_generator(m, new lua_report_generator(L, m));
3700         return 0;
3701 }

3712 /**
3713  * Teeleports a unit to a location.
3714  * Arg 1: unit
3715  * Arg 2: target location
3716  * Arg 3: bool (ignore_passability)
3717  * Arg 4: bool (clear_shroud)
3718  * Arg 5: bool (animate)
3719  */
3720 int game_lua_kernel::intf_teleport(lua_State *L)
3721 {
3722         unit_ptr u = luaW_checkunit_ptr(L, 1, true);
3723         map_location dst = luaW_checklocation(L, 2);
3724         bool check_passability = !luaW_toboolean(L, 3);
3725         bool clear_shroud = luaW_toboolean(L, 4);
3726         bool animate = luaW_toboolean(L, 5);
3727 
3728         if (dst == u->get_location() || !map().on_board(dst)) {
3729                 return 0;
3730         }
3731         const map_location vacant_dst = find_vacant_tile(dst, pathfind::VACANT_ANY, check_passability ? u.get() : nullptr);
3732         if (!map().on_board(vacant_dst)) {
3733                 return 0;
3734         }
3735         // Clear the destination hex before the move (so the animation can be seen).
3736         actions::shroud_clearer clearer;
3737         if ( clear_shroud ) {
3738                 clearer.clear_dest(vacant_dst, *u);
3739         }
3740 
3741         map_location src_loc = u->get_location();
3742 
3743         std::vector<map_location> teleport_path;
3744         teleport_path.push_back(src_loc);
3745         teleport_path.push_back(vacant_dst);
3746         unit_display::move_unit(teleport_path, u, animate);
3747 
3748         units().move(src_loc, vacant_dst);
3749         unit::clear_status_caches();
3750 
3751         u = &*units().find(vacant_dst);
3752         u->anim_comp().set_standing();
3753 
3754         if ( clear_shroud ) {
3755                 // Now that the unit is visibly in position, clear the shroud.
3756                 clearer.clear_unit(vacant_dst, *u);
3757         }
3758 
3759         if (map().is_village(vacant_dst)) {
3760                 actions::get_village(vacant_dst, u->side());
3761         }
3762 
3763         game_display_->invalidate_unit_after_move(src_loc, vacant_dst);
3764         game_display_->draw();
3765 
3766         // Sighted events.
3767         clearer.fire_events();
3768         return 0;
3769 }

3772  * Removes a sound source by its ID

3775 int game_lua_kernel::intf_remove_sound_source(lua_State *L)

3783 /**
3784  * Add a new sound source
3785  * Arg 1: Table containing keyword arguments
3786  */
3787 int game_lua_kernel::intf_add_sound_source(lua_State *L)
3788 {
3789         soundsource::manager* man = play_controller_.get_soundsource_man();
3790         config cfg = luaW_checkconfig(L, 1);
3791         try {
3792                 soundsource::sourcespec spec(cfg);
3793                 man->add(spec);
3794                 man->update();
3795         } catch (bad_lexical_cast &) {
3796                 ERR_LUA << "Error when parsing sound_source config: invalid parameter." << std::endl;
3797                 ERR_LUA << "sound_source config was: " << cfg.debug() << std::endl;
3798                 ERR_LUA << "Skipping this sound source..." << std::endl;
3799         }
3800         return 0;
3801 }
3802 
3803 /**
3804  * Get an existing sound source
3805  * Arg 1: The sound source ID
3806  * Return: Config of sound source info, or nil if it didn't exist
3807  * This is a copy of the sound source info, so you need to call
3808  * add_sound_source again after changing it.
3809  */
3810 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_sound_source(lua_State *L)
3811 {
3812         soundsource::manager* man = play_controller_.get_soundsource_man();
3813         std::string id = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
3814         config cfg = man->get(id);
3815         if(cfg.empty()) {
3816                 return 0;
3817         }
3818         // Sound sources do not know their own string ID
3819         // Thus, we need to add this manually
3820         cfg["id"] = id;
3821         luaW_pushconfig(L, cfg);
3822         return 1;
3823 }

3825 /**
3826  * Logs a message
3827  * Arg 1: (optional) Logger; "wml" for WML errors or deprecations
3828  * Arg 2: Message
3829  * Arg 3: Whether to print to chat (always true if arg 1 is "wml")
3830  */
3831 int game_lua_kernel::intf_log(lua_State *L)
3832 {
3833         const std::string& logger = lua_isstring(L, 2) ? luaL_checkstring(L, 1) : "";
3834         const std::string& msg = lua_isstring(L, 2) ? luaL_checkstring(L, 2) : luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
3835 
3836         if(logger == "wml" || logger == "WML") {
3837                 lg::wml_error() << msg << '\n';
3838         } else {
3839                 bool in_chat = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
3840                 game_state_.events_manager_->pump().put_wml_message(logger,msg,in_chat);
3841         }
3842         return 0;
3843 }

3845 int game_lua_kernel::intf_get_fog_or_shroud(lua_State *L, bool fog)
3846 {
3847         int side = luaL_checknumber(L, 1);
3848         map_location loc = luaW_checklocation(L, 2);
3849         if(side < 1 || static_cast<size_t>(side) > teams().size()) {
3850                 std::string error = "side " + std::to_string(side) + " does not exist";
3851                 return luaL_argerror(L, 1, error.c_str());
3852         }
3853 
3854         team& t = board().get_team(side);
3855         lua_pushboolean(L, fog ? t.fogged(loc) : t.shrouded(loc));
3856         return 1;
3857 }
3858 
3859 /**
3860  * Implements the lifting and resetting of fog via WML.
3861  * Keeping affect_normal_fog as false causes only the fog override to be affected.
3862  * Otherwise, fog lifting will be implemented similar to normal sight (cannot be
3863  * individually reset and ends at the end of the turn), and fog resetting will, in
3864  * addition to removing overrides, extend the specified teams' normal fog to all
3865  * hexes.
3866  *
3867  * Arg 1: (optional) Side number, or list of side numbers
3868  * Arg 2: List of locations; each is a two-element array or a table with x and y keys
3869  * Arg 3: (optional) boolean
3870  */
3871 int game_lua_kernel::intf_toggle_fog(lua_State *L, const bool clear)
3872 {
3873         bool affect_normal_fog = false;
3874         if(lua_isboolean(L, -1)) {
3875                 affect_normal_fog = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
3876         }
3877         std::set<int> sides;
3878         if(lua_isnumber(L, 1)) {
3879                 sides.insert(lua_tonumber(L, 1));
3880         } else if(lua_istable(L, 1) && lua_istable(L, 2)) {
3881                 const auto& v = lua_check<std::vector<int>>(L, 1);
3882                 sides.insert(v.begin(), v.end());
3883         } else {
3884                 for(const team& t : teams()) {
3885                         sides.insert(t.side()+1);
3886                 }
3887         }
3888         const auto& v_locs = lua_check<std::vector<map_location>>(L, lua_istable(L, 2) ? 2 : 1);
3889         std::set<map_location> locs(v_locs.begin(), v_locs.end());
3890 
3891         for(const int &side_num : sides) {
3892                 if(side_num < 1 || static_cast<size_t>(side_num) > teams().size()) {
3893                         continue;
3894                 }
3895                 team &t = board().get_team(side_num);
3896                 if(!clear) {
3897                         // Extend fog.
3898                         t.remove_fog_override(locs);
3899                         if(affect_normal_fog) {
3900                                 t.refog();
3901                         }
3902                 } else if(!affect_normal_fog) {
3903                         // Force the locations clear of fog.
3904                         t.add_fog_override(locs);
3905                 } else {
3906                         // Simply clear fog from the locations.
3907                         for(const map_location &hex : locs) {
3908                                 t.clear_fog(hex);
3909                         }
3910                 }
3911         }
3912 
3913         // Flag a screen update.
3914         game_display_->recalculate_minimap();
3915         game_display_->invalidate_all();
3916         return 0;
3917 }

3952         , game_display_(nullptr)

3961         queued_events_.push(&default_queued_event);

3964

3984                 { "sound_volume",             &intf_sound_volume             },

3987                 { "unit_movement_cost",       &intf_unit_movement_cost       },
3988                 { "unit_vision_cost",         &intf_unit_vision_cost         },

3990                 { "unit_resistance",          &intf_unit_resistance          },
3991                 { "unsynced",                 &intf_do_unsynced              },

4000                 { "clear_menu_item",           &dispatch<&game_lua_kernel::intf_clear_menu_item            >        },

4218 
4219 void game_lua_kernel::initialize(const config& level)
4220 {
4221         lua_State *L = mState;
4222         assert(level_lua_.empty());
4223         level_lua_.append_children(level, "lua");
4224         // Create the sides table.
4225         // note:
4226         // This table is redundant to the return value of wesnoth.get_sides({}).
4227         // Still needed for backwards compatibility.
4228         lua_settop(L, 0);
4229         lua_getglobal(L, "wesnoth");
4230 
4231         lua_pushstring(L, "get_sides");
4232         lua_rawget(L, -2);
4233         lua_createtable(L, 0, 0);
4234 
4235         if (!protected_call(1, 1, std::bind(&lua_kernel_base::log_error, this, _1, _2))) {
4236                 cmd_log_ << "Failed to compute wesnoth.sides\n";
4237         } else {
4238                 lua_setfield(L, -2, "sides");
4239                 cmd_log_ << "Added wesnoth.sides\n";
4240         }
4241 
4242         //Create the races table.
4243         cmd_log_ << "Adding races table...\n";
4244 
4245         lua_settop(L, 0);
4246         lua_getglobal(L, "wesnoth");
4247         luaW_pushracetable(L);
4248         lua_setfield(L, -2, "races");
4249         lua_pop(L, 1);
4250 
4251         // Execute the preload scripts.
4252         cmd_log_ << "Running preload scripts...\n";
4253 
4254         game_config::load_config(game_lua_kernel::preload_config);
4255         for (const config &cfg : game_lua_kernel::preload_scripts) {
4256                 run_lua_tag(cfg);
4257         }
4258         for (const config &cfg : level_lua_.child_range("lua")) {
4259                 run_lua_tag(cfg);
4260         }
4261 }

4263 void game_lua_kernel::set_game_display(game_display * gd) {
4264         game_display_ = gd;
4265 }
4266 
4267 /// These are the child tags of [scenario] (and the like) that are handled
4268 /// elsewhere (in the C++ code).
4269 /// Any child tags not in this list will be passed to Lua's on_load event.
4270 static char const *handled_file_tags[] {
4271         "color_palette", "color_range", "display", "end_level_data", "era",
4272         "event", "generator", "label", "lua", "map", "menu_item",
4273         "modification", "music", "options", "side", "sound_source",
4274         "story", "terrain_graphics", "time", "time_area", "tunnel",
4275         "undo_stack", "variables"
4276 };
4277 
4278 static bool is_handled_file_tag(const std::string &s)
4279 {
4280         for (char const *t : handled_file_tags) {
4281                 if (s == t) return true;
4282         }
4283         return false;
4284 }
4285 
4286 /**
4287  * Executes the game_events.on_load function and passes to it all the
4288  * scenario tags not yet handled.
4289  */
4290 void game_lua_kernel::load_game(const config& level)
4291 {
4292         lua_State *L = mState;
4293 
4294         if (!luaW_getglobal(L, "wesnoth", "game_events", "on_load"))
4295                 return;
4296 
4297         lua_newtable(L);
4298         int k = 1;
4299         for (const config::any_child &v : level.all_children_range())
4300         {
4301                 if (is_handled_file_tag(v.key)) continue;
4302                 lua_createtable(L, 2, 0);
4303                 lua_pushstring(L, v.key.c_str());
4304                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 1);
4305                 luaW_pushconfig(L, v.cfg);
4306                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, 2);
4307                 lua_rawseti(L, -2, k++);
4308         }
4309 
4310         luaW_pcall(L, 1, 0, true);
4311 }
4312 
4313 /**
4314  * Executes the game_events.on_save function and adds to @a cfg the
4315  * returned tags. Also flushes the [lua] tags.
4316  */
4317 void game_lua_kernel::save_game(config &cfg)
4318 {
4319         lua_State *L = mState;
4320 
4321         if (!luaW_getglobal(L, "wesnoth", "game_events", "on_save"))
4322                 return;
4323 
4324         if (!luaW_pcall(L, 0, 1, false))
4325                 return;
4326 
4327         config v;
4328         luaW_toconfig(L, -1, v);
4329         lua_pop(L, 1);
4330 
4331         for (;;)
4332         {
4333                 config::all_children_iterator i = v.ordered_begin();
4334                 if (i == v.ordered_end()) break;
4335                 if (is_handled_file_tag(i->key))
4336                 {
4337                         /*
4338                          * It seems the only tags appearing in the config v variable here
4339                          * are the core-lua-handled (currently [item] and [objectives])
4340                          * and the extra UMC ones.
4341                          */
4342                         const std::string m = "Tag is already used: [" + i->key + "]";
4343                         log_error(m.c_str());
4344                         v.erase(i);
4345                         continue;
4346                 }
4347                 cfg.splice_children(v, i->key);
4348         }
4349 }

4351 /**
4352  * Executes the game_events.on_event function.
4353  * Returns false if there was no lua handler for this event
4354  */
4355 bool game_lua_kernel::run_event(game_events::queued_event const &ev)
4356 {
4357         lua_State *L = mState;
4358 
4359         if (!luaW_getglobal(L, "wesnoth", "game_events", "on_event"))
4360                 return false;
4361 
4362         queued_event_context dummy(&ev, queued_events_);
4363         lua_pushstring(L, ev.name.c_str());
4364         luaW_pcall(L, 1, 0, false);
4365         return true;
4366 }
4367 
4368 /**
4369  * Applies its upvalue as an effect
4370  * Arg 1: The unit to apply to
4371  * Arg 3: The [effect] tag contents
4372  * Arg 3: If false, only build description
4373  * Return: The description of the effect
4374  */
4375 int game_lua_kernel::cfun_builtin_effect(lua_State *L)
4376 {
4377         std::string which_effect = lua_tostring(L, lua_upvalueindex(1));
4378         bool need_apply = luaW_toboolean(L, lua_upvalueindex(2));
4379         // Argument 1 is the implicit "self" argument, which isn't needed here
4380         lua_unit u(luaW_checkunit(L, 2));
4381         config cfg = luaW_checkconfig(L, 3);
4382 
4383         // The times= key is supposed to be ignored by the effect function.
4384         // However, just in case someone doesn't realize this, we will set it to 1 here.
4385         cfg["times"] = 1;
4386 
4387         if(need_apply) {
4388                 u->apply_builtin_effect(which_effect, cfg);
4389                 return 0;
4390         } else {
4391                 std::string description = u->describe_builtin_effect(which_effect, cfg);
4392                 lua_pushstring(L, description.c_str());
4393                 return 1;
4394         }
4395 }
4396 
4397 /**
4398 * Registers a function for use as an effect handler.
4399 */
4400 void game_lua_kernel::push_builtin_effect()
4401 {
4402         lua_State *L = mState;
4403 
4404         // The effect name is at the top of the stack
4405         int str_i = lua_gettop(L);
4406         lua_newtable(L); // The functor table
4407         lua_newtable(L); // The functor metatable
4408         lua_pushstring(L, "__call");
4409         lua_pushvalue(L, str_i);
4410         lua_pushboolean(L, true);
4411         lua_pushcclosure(L, &dispatch<&game_lua_kernel::cfun_builtin_effect>, 2);
4412         lua_rawset(L, -3); // Set the call metafunction
4413         lua_pushstring(L, "__descr");
4414         lua_pushvalue(L, str_i);
4415         lua_pushboolean(L, false);
4416         lua_pushcclosure(L, &dispatch<&game_lua_kernel::cfun_builtin_effect>, 2);
4417         lua_rawset(L, -3); // Set the descr "metafunction"
4418         lua_setmetatable(L, -2); // Apply the metatable to the functor table
4419 }

4422 /**
4423  * Executes its upvalue as a wml action.
4424  */
4425 int game_lua_kernel::cfun_wml_action(lua_State *L)
4426 {
4427         game_events::wml_action::handler h = reinterpret_cast<game_events::wml_action::handler>
4428                 (lua_touserdata(L, lua_upvalueindex(1)));
4429 
4430         vconfig vcfg = luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1);
4431         h(get_event_info(), vcfg);
4432         return 0;
4433 }
4434 
4435 /**
4436  * Registers a function for use as an action handler.
4437  */
4438 void game_lua_kernel::set_wml_action(const std::string& cmd, game_events::wml_action::handler h)
4439 {
4440         lua_State *L = mState;
4441 
4442         lua_getglobal(L, "wesnoth");
4443         lua_pushstring(L, "wml_actions");
4444         lua_rawget(L, -2);
4445         lua_pushstring(L, cmd.c_str());
4446         lua_pushlightuserdata(L, reinterpret_cast<void *>(h));
4447         lua_pushcclosure(L, &dispatch<&game_lua_kernel::cfun_wml_action>, 1);
4448         lua_rawset(L, -3);
4449         lua_pop(L, 2);
4450 }
4451 
4452 using wml_conditional_handler = bool(*)(const vconfig&);
4453 
4454 /**
4455  * Executes its upvalue as a wml condition and returns the result.
4456  */
4457 static int cfun_wml_condition(lua_State *L)
4458 {
4459         wml_conditional_handler h = reinterpret_cast<wml_conditional_handler>
4460                 (lua_touserdata(L, lua_upvalueindex(1)));
4461 
4462         vconfig vcfg = luaW_checkvconfig(L, 1);
4463         lua_pushboolean(L, h(vcfg));
4464         return 1;
4465 }
4466 
4467 /**
4468  * Registers a function for use as a conditional handler.
4469  */
4470 void game_lua_kernel::set_wml_condition(const std::string& cmd, wml_conditional_handler h)
4471 {
4472         lua_State *L = mState;
4473 
4474         lua_getglobal(L, "wesnoth");
4475         lua_pushstring(L, "wml_conditionals");
4476         lua_rawget(L, -2);
4477         lua_pushstring(L, cmd.c_str());
4478         lua_pushlightuserdata(L, reinterpret_cast<void *>(h));
4479         lua_pushcclosure(L, &cfun_wml_condition, 1);
4480         lua_rawset(L, -3);
4481         lua_pop(L, 2);
4482 }
4483 
4484 /**
4485  * Runs a command from an event handler.
4486  * @return true if there is a handler for the command.
4487  * @note @a cfg should be either volatile or long-lived since the Lua
4488  *       code may grab it for an arbitrary long time.
4489  */
4490 bool game_lua_kernel::run_wml_action(const std::string& cmd, vconfig const &cfg,
4491         game_events::queued_event const &ev)
4492 {
4493         lua_State *L = mState;
4494 
4495 
4496         if (!luaW_getglobal(L, "wesnoth", "wml_actions", cmd))
4497                 return false;
4498 
4499         queued_event_context dummy(&ev, queued_events_);
4500         luaW_pushvconfig(L, cfg);
4501         luaW_pcall(L, 1, 0, true);
4502         return true;
4503 }
4504 
4505 
4506 /**
4507  * Runs a command from an event handler.
4508  * @return true if there is a handler for the command.
4509  * @note @a cfg should be either volatile or long-lived since the Lua
4510  *       code may grab it for an arbitrary long time.
4511  */
4512 bool game_lua_kernel::run_wml_conditional(const std::string& cmd, vconfig const &cfg)
4513 {
4514         lua_State *L = mState;
4515 
4516 
4517         if (!luaW_getglobal(L, "wesnoth", "wml_conditionals", cmd)) {
4518                 lg::wml_error() << "unknown conditional wml: [" << cmd << "]\n";
4519                 return true;
4520         }
4521 
4522         luaW_pushvconfig(L, cfg);
4523         luaW_pcall(L, 1, 1, true);
4524 
4525         bool b = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
4526         lua_pop(L, 1);
4527         return b;
4528 }

4531 /**
4532 * Runs a script from a location filter.
4533 * The script is an already compiled function given by its name.
4534 */
4535 bool game_lua_kernel::run_filter(char const *name, const map_location& l)
4536 {
4537         lua_pushinteger(mState, l.wml_x());
4538         lua_pushinteger(mState, l.wml_y());
4539         return run_filter(name, 2);
4540 }
4541 /**
4542 * Runs a script from a unit filter.
4543 * The script is an already compiled function given by its name.
4544 */
4545 bool game_lua_kernel::run_filter(char const *name, unit const &u)
4546 {
4547         lua_State *L = mState;
4548         unit_map::const_unit_iterator ui = units().find(u.get_location());
4549         if (!ui.valid()) return false;
4550         // Pass the unit as argument.
4551         luaW_pushunit(L, ui->underlying_id());
4552 
4553         return run_filter(name, 1);
4554 }
4555 /**
4556 * Runs a script from a filter.
4557 * The script is an already compiled function given by its name.
4558 */
4559 bool game_lua_kernel::run_filter(char const *name, int nArgs)
4560 {
4561         map_locker(this);
4562         lua_State *L = mState;
4563         // Get the user filter by name.
4564         const std::vector<std::string>& path = utils::split(name, '.', utils::STRIP_SPACES);
4565         if (!luaW_getglobal(L, path))
4566         {
4567                 std::string message = std::string() + "function " + name + " not found";
4568                 log_error(message.c_str(), "Lua SUF Error");
4569                 //we pushed nothing and can safeley return.
4570                 return false;
4571         }
4572         lua_insert(L, -nArgs - 1);
4573 
4574         if (!luaW_pcall(L, nArgs, 1)) return false;
4575 
4576         bool b = luaW_toboolean(L, -1);
4577         lua_pop(L, 1);
4578         return b;
4579 }
4580 
4581 std::string game_lua_kernel::apply_effect(const std::string& name, unit& u, const config& cfg, bool need_apply)
4582 {
4583         lua_State *L = mState;
4584         int top = lua_gettop(L);
4585         std::string descr;
4586         // Stack: nothing
4587         lua_unit* lu = luaW_pushlocalunit(L, u);
4588         // Stack: unit
4589         // (Note: The unit needs to be on the stack twice to prevent untimely GC.)
4590         luaW_pushconfig(L, cfg);
4591         // Stack: unit, cfg
4592         if(luaW_getglobal(L, "wesnoth", "effects", name)) {
4593                 map_locker(this);
4594                 // Stack: unit, cfg, effect
4595                 if(lua_istable(L, -1)) {
4596                         // Effect is implemented by a table with __call and __descr
4597                         if(need_apply) {
4598                                 lua_pushvalue(L, -1);
4599                                 // Stack: unit, cfg, effect, effect
4600                                 lua_pushvalue(L, top + 1);
4601                                 // Stack: unit, cfg, effect, effect, unit
4602                                 lua_pushvalue(L, top + 2);
4603                                 // Stack: unit, cfg, effect, effect, unit, cfg
4604                                 luaW_pcall(L, 2, 0);
4605                                 // Stack: unit, cfg, effect
4606                         }
4607                         if(luaL_getmetafield(L, -1, "__descr")) {
4608                                 // Stack: unit, cfg, effect, __descr
4609                                 if(lua_isstring(L, -1)) {
4610                                         // __descr was a static string
4611                                         descr = lua_tostring(L, -1);
4612                                 } else {
4613                                         lua_pushvalue(L, -2);
4614                                         // Stack: unit, cfg, effect, __descr, effect
4615                                         lua_pushvalue(L, top + 1);
4616                                         // Stack: unit, cfg, effect, __descr, effect, unit
4617                                         lua_pushvalue(L, top + 2);
4618                                         // Stack: unit, cfg, effect, __descr, effect, unit, cfg
4619                                         luaW_pcall(L, 3, 1);
4620                                         if(lua_isstring(L, -1) && !lua_isnumber(L, -1)) {
4621                                                 descr = lua_tostring(L, -1);
4622                                         } else {
4623                                                 ERR_LUA << "Effect __descr metafunction should have returned a string, but instead returned ";
4624                                                 if(lua_isnone(L, -1)) {
4625                                                         ERR_LUA << "nothing";
4626                                                 } else {
4627                                                         ERR_LUA << lua_typename(L, lua_type(L, -1));
4628                                                 }
4629                                         }
4630                                 }
4631                         }
4632                 } else if(need_apply) {
4633                         // Effect is assumed to be a simple function; no description is provided
4634                         lua_pushvalue(L, top + 1);
4635                         // Stack: unit, cfg, effect, unit
4636                         lua_pushvalue(L, top + 2);
4637                         // Stack: unit, cfg, effect, unit, cfg
4638                         luaW_pcall(L, 2, 0);
4639                         // Stack: unit, cfg
4640                 }
4641         }
4642         lua_settop(L, top);
4643         lu->clear_ref();
4644         return descr;
4645 }

4657 void game_lua_kernel::mouse_over_hex_callback(const map_location& loc)
4658 {
4659         lua_State *L = mState;
4660 
4661         if (!luaW_getglobal(L, "wesnoth", "game_events", "on_mouse_move")) {
4662                 return;
4663         }
4664         lua_push(L, loc.wml_x());
4665         lua_push(L, loc.wml_y());
4666         luaW_pcall(L, 2, 0, false);
4667         return;
4668 }
